14668515Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool TryGetTags(string tagsInput, out string[] tags)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Regex regex = new Regex(@"^[\\w_-]+$");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tags = tagsInput.Split(',')  // Rule 6Di2015NewLine                    .Select(tag => tag.Trim())Di2015NewLine                    .ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (tags.Last() == "")Di2015NewLine        tags = tags.Take(tags.Length - 1).ToArray();  // Rule 7Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (tags.Any(tag => tag == ""))  // (no empty tag allowed except last one)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (tags.Length > 9)Di2015NewLine        return false;  // Rule 2Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (tags.Any(tag => tag.Length > 30))Di2015NewLine        return false;  // Rule 4Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (tags.Distinct().Count() != tags.Length)Di2015NewLine        return false;  // Rule 3Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (tags.Any(tag => !regex.IsMatch(tag)))Di2015NewLine        return false;  // Rule 5Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14670440Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string Encrypt(string toEncrypt, bool useHashing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] keyArray;Di2015NewLine        byte[] toEncryptArray = UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(toEncrypt);Di2015NewLine        string key = "UglyRandomKeyLike-lkj54923c478";Di2015NewLine        if (useHashing)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MD5CryptoServiceProvider hashmd5 = new MD5CryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine            keyArray = hashmd5.ComputeHash(UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(key));Di2015NewLine            hashmd5.Clear();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            keyArray = UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider tdes = new TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine        tdes.Key = keyArray;Di2015NewLine        tdes.Mode = CipherMode.ECB;Di2015NewLine        tdes.Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ICryptoTransform cTransform = tdes.CreateEncryptor();Di2015NewLine        byte[] resultArray = cTransform.TransformFinalBlock(toEncryptArray, 0, toEncryptArray.Length);Di2015NewLine        tdes.Clear();Di2015NewLine        return Convert.ToBase64String(resultArray, 0, resultArray.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
14670440Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string Decrypt(string cipherString, bool useHashing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] keyArray;Di2015NewLine        byte[] toEncryptArray = Convert.FromBase64String(cipherString);Di2015NewLine        string key = "UglyRandomKeyLike-lkj54923c478";Di2015NewLine        if (useHashing)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MD5CryptoServiceProvider hashmd5 = new MD5CryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine            keyArray = hashmd5.ComputeHash(UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(key));Di2015NewLine            hashmd5.Clear();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            keyArray = UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider tdes = new TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine        tdes.Key = keyArray;Di2015NewLine        tdes.Mode = CipherMode.ECB;Di2015NewLine        tdes.Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ICryptoTransform cTransform = tdes.CreateDecryptor();Di2015NewLine        byte[] resultArray = cTransform.TransformFinalBlock(toEncryptArray, 0, toEncryptArray.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tdes.Clear();Di2015NewLine        return UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetString(resultArray);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14675701Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SNodeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public String Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly List<SNode> _Nodes = new List<SNode>();Di2015NewLine    public ICollection<SNode> Nodes { get { return _Nodes; } }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14675701Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic String Serialize(SNode root)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    Serialize(root, sb);Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void Serialize(SNode node, StringBuilder sb)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    sb.Append('(');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sb.Append(node.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var item in node.Nodes)Di2015NewLine        Serialize(item, sb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sb.Append(" )");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14675701Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic SNode Deserialize(String st)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(st))Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var node = new SNode();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var nodesPos = String.IndexOf('(');Di2015NewLine    var endPos = String.LastIndexOf(')');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var childrenString = st.SubString(nodesPos, endPos - nodesPos);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    node.Name = st.SubString(1, (nodesPos >= 0 ? nodePos : endPos)).TrimEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var childStrings = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int brackets = 0;Di2015NewLine    int startPos = nodesPos;Di2015NewLine    for (int pos = nodesPos; pos++; pos < endPos)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (st[pos] == '(')Di2015NewLine            brackets++;Di2015NewLine        else if (st[pos] == ')')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            brackets--;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (brackets == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                childStrings.Add(st.SubString(startPos, pos - startPos + 1));Di2015NewLine                startPos = pos + 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var child in childStrings)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var childNode = Deserialize(this, child);Di2015NewLine        if (childNode != null)Di2015NewLine            node.Nodes.Add(childNode);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return node;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14675741Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class IEnumerableComparer<T> : IEqualityComparer<IEnumerable<T>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(IEnumerable<T> x, IEnumerable<T> y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Object.ReferenceEquals(x, y) || (x != null && y != null && x.SequenceEqual(y));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(IEnumerable<T> obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (obj == null)Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return unchecked(obj.Select(e => e.GetHashCode()).Aggregate(0, (a, b) => a + b));  // BAD Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14677159Di2015UniqueSeparator    public override void OnActionExecuting(ActionExecutingContext filterContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var request         = possibleCultures                = UnitOfWork.CulturesRepository.GetListOfCultureNames();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (possibleCultures.All(culture => currentLanguageFromUrl != culture))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string cultureName;Di2015NewLine            string newUrl;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (currentLanguageFromCookie != 14677191Di2015UniqueSeparatorHashSet<long> _xyPairs = new HashSet<long>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void SetTravelled(int x, int y, bool travelled)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var t = Combine(x, y)Di2015NewLine    ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate bool HaveTravelled(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return _xyPairs.Contains(Combine(x, y));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static long Combine(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (long)(((ulong)x) | ((ulong)y) << 32);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14677716Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TeacherDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int TeacherID { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string FirstName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string LastName { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IQueryable<Course> Courses { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Teacher()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Courses = new IQueryable<Course>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class TeacherEditorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Teacher Teacher { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int[] SelectedCourseIds { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public List<Course> CourseList Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return Teacher.Courses.ToList(); }Di2015NewLine            set { Teacher.Courses = value.ToList(); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
14677767Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace MyProject.UtilDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinepublic class LruCache<Key, Value>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public delegate Value ValueCreator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dictionary<Key, ValueWithReference> cache;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //The maximum number of elements that can fit in the cache.Di2015NewLine    int maxCacheSize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerator<Value> valueRemover;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public LruCache(int maxCacheSize) {Di2015NewLine        this.cache = new Dictionary<Key, ValueWithReference>();Di2015NewLine        this.maxCacheSize = maxCacheSize;Di2015NewLine        this.valueRemover = GetKeyValuePairRemover().GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the value associated with the specified key. If it doesn't exist in the cache Di2015NewLine    /// then it will be created with createValue() and added to the cache. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public Value GetAndAddValue(Key key, ValueCreator createValue) {Di2015NewLine        if (this.cache.ContainsKey(key) == false)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (this.cache.Count >= this.maxCacheSize) {Di2015NewLine                this.valueRemover.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.cache[key] = new ValueWithReference(createValue());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.cache[key].recentlyUsed = true;Di2015NewLine        return this.cache[key].value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected IEnumerable<Value> GetKeyValuePairRemover() { Di2015NewLine        while (true) {Di2015NewLine            List<Key> keyList = this.cache.Keys.ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach(Key key in keyList) {Di2015NewLine                if (this.cache[key].recentlyUsed)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this.cache[key].recentlyUsed = false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else {Di2015NewLine                    Value removedValue = this.cache[key].value;Di2015NewLine                    this.cache.Remove(key);Di2015NewLine                    yield return removedValue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected class ValueWithReferenceDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Value value;Di2015NewLine        public bool recentlyUsed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ValueWithReference(Value value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.value = value;Di2015NewLine            this.recentlyUsed = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14679585Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// for OleDB (Access, VFP, etc)Di2015NewLineusing System.Data.OleDb;Di2015NewLine// for SQL-ServerDi2015NewLineusing System.Data.SqlClient;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace DataMgmtDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class MyConnectionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // no matter the connection to server, it will require some "handle"Di2015NewLine        // that is of type "IDbConnection"Di2015NewLine        protected IDbConnection sqlConnectionHandle;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // when querying, ANY query could have an exception that needs to haveDi2015NewLine        // possible further review for handlingDi2015NewLine        public Exception LastExceptionDi2015NewLine        { get; protected set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // When calling an execute command (select, insert, update, delete), Di2015NewLine        // they all can return how many rows affectedDi2015NewLine        public int RowsAffectedByQueryDi2015NewLine        { get; protected set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // different databases could have different connection strings. MakeDi2015NewLine        // virtual and throw exception so sub-classed must return proper formatted.Di2015NewLine        public virtual string GetConnectionString()Di2015NewLine        { throw new Exception("GetConnectionString() method must be overridden."); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // each has its own "IDbConnection" type tooDi2015NewLine        protected virtual IDbConnection SQLConnectionHandle()Di2015NewLine        { return sqlConnectionHandle; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public virtual IDbCommand GetSQLDbCommand()Di2015NewLine        { throw new Exception("GetSQLDbCommand() method must be overridden."); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // generic routine to get a data parameter...Di2015NewLine        public virtual IDbDataParameter AddDbParmSpecificValue(string ParmName, object UnknownValue)Di2015NewLine        { throw new Exception("AddDbParmSpecificValue() method must be overwritten per specific connection."); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // generic "Connection" since they are all based on IDbCommand...Di2015NewLine        public override bool SQLConnect()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // pre-blank exception in case remnant from previous activityDi2015NewLine            LastException = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (sqlConnectionHandle.State != System.Data.ConnectionState.Open)Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // if not open, always make sure we get updated connection stringDi2015NewLine                    // if ever changed by some other "unknown" condition...Di2015NewLine                    sqlConnectionHandle.ConnectionString = GetConnectionString();Di2015NewLine                    sqlConnectionHandle.Open();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Preserve in generic sqlException" property for analysis OUTSIDE this functionDi2015NewLine                    LastException = ex;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // if NOT connected, display message to user and set error code and exceptionDi2015NewLine            if (sqlConnectionHandle.State != System.Data.ConnectionState.Open)Di2015NewLine                LastException = new Exception("Unable to open database connection.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // return if it IS successful at opening the connection (or was already open)Di2015NewLine            return sqlConnectionHandle.State == System.Data.ConnectionState.Open;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // likewise disconnect could be commonDi2015NewLine        public void SQLDisconnect()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (sqlConnectionHandle != null)Di2015NewLine                if (sqlConnectionHandle.State == ConnectionState.Open)Di2015NewLine                    sqlConnectionHandle.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool SqlExecNonQuery( IDbCommand SQLCmd, DataTable oTbl)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // pre-clear exceptionDi2015NewLine            LastException = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // fill the table...Di2015NewLine            SQLConnect();Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                RowsAffectedByQuery = SQLCmd.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                LastException = e;Di2015NewLine                throw e;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                SQLDisconnect();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Its all ok if no exception errorDi2015NewLine            return LastException == null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Now, build your connection manager per specific typeDi2015NewLine    public class MyAccessConnection : MyConnectionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public MyAccessConnection()Di2015NewLine        {   sqlConnectionHandle =  new OleDbConnection();   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override string GetConnectionString()Di2015NewLine        {   return "Your Connection String from AppSettings.. any changes if OleDb vs SQL"; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override IDbCommand GetSQLDbCommand()Di2015NewLine        {   return new OleDbCommand( "", (OleDbConnection)sqlConnectionHandle ); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override IDbDataParameter AddDbParmSpecificValue(string ParmName, object UnknownValue)Di2015NewLine        {   return new OleDbParameter( ParmName, UnknownValue );    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class MySQLConnection : MyConnectionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public MySQLConnection()Di2015NewLine        {   sqlConnectionHandle = new SqlConnection();  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override string GetConnectionString()Di2015NewLine        { return "Your Connection String from AppSettings... any alterations needed??? "; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override IDbCommand GetSQLDbCommand()Di2015NewLine        { return new SqlCommand ("", (SqlConnection)sqlConnectionHandle); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override IDbDataParameter AddDbParmSpecificValue(string ParmName, object UnknownValue)Di2015NewLine        { return new SqlParameter(ParmName, UnknownValue); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Now to implement... pick one... Access or SQL-Server for derivation...Di2015NewLine    public class MyDataLayer : MyAccessConnectionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public void SomeSQLCall()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IDbCommand sqlcmd = GetSQLDbCommand();Di2015NewLine            sqlcmd.CommandText = "UPDATE TileTypes SET Title = @Title, "Di2015NewLine                                + "Picture = @Picture, "Di2015NewLine                                + "Color = @Color "Di2015NewLine                                + "WHERE ID = @ID";Di2015NewLine            sqlcmd.Parameters.Add( AddDbParmSpecificValue( "@Title", titleTextBox.Text.Trim() ));Di2015NewLine            sqlcmd.Parameters.Add( AddDbParmSpecificValue( "@Picture", typePictureBox.ImageLocation) );Di2015NewLine            sqlcmd.Parameters.Add( AddDbParmSpecificValue( "@Color", colorButton.BackColor.ToArgb()) );Di2015NewLine            sqlcmd.Parameters.Add( AddDbParmSpecificValue(  "@ID", id));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if( SqlExecNonQuery(sqlcmd))Di2015NewLine            // Good to goDi2015NewLine            DoSomethingWithTheData;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            // Notify of whatever error thrown....Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14686730Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar xml = CQ.Create(d.ToXml());Di2015NewLine//this can be simpler with CSS selectors but I chose Linq since you'll probably find it easierDi2015NewLine//Find joe, in our case the node that has the text 'Joe'Di2015NewLinevar joe = xml["*"].First(x => x.InnerHTML.Equals("Joe")); Di2015NewLine//Find the last (deepest) element that answers the critiria that it has "Joe" in it, and has a VBD in itDi2015NewLine//in our case the VPDi2015NewLinevar closestToVbd = xml["*"].Last(x => x.Cq().Has(joe).Has("VBD").Any());Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Closest node to VPD:\\n " +closestToVbd.OuterHTML);Di2015NewLine//If we want the VBD itself we can just find the VBD in that elementDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("\\n\\n VBD itself is " + closestToVbd.Cq().Find("VBD")[0].OuterHTML);Di2015NewLine

14696033Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void OverrideMethod(TypeBuilder typeBuilder, Di2015NewLine                            Type interfaceToOverride,Di2015NewLine                            MethodInfo methodToOverride)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Create the method stubDi2015NewLine    MethodBuilder methodBuilder = typeBuilder.DefineMethod(Di2015NewLine        /* Change method name here */Di2015NewLine        string.Format("{0}.{1}", interfaceToOverride.FullName,Di2015NewLine            methodToOverride.Name),Di2015NewLine        MethodAttributes.PublicDi2015NewLine        | MethodAttributes.HideBySigDi2015NewLine        | MethodAttributes.NewSlotDi2015NewLine        | MethodAttributes.VirtualDi2015NewLine        | MethodAttributes.Final,Di2015NewLine        CallingConventions.HasThis,Di2015NewLine        methodToOverride.ReturnType,Di2015NewLine        methodToOverride.GetParameters().Select(p => p.ParameterType).ToArray()Di2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Implement the overriding methodDi2015NewLine    ILGenerator il = methodBuilder.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ... a bunch of calls to il.Emit ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Return Di2015NewLine    il.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // And define a methodimpl, which consists of a pair of metadata tokens.Di2015NewLine    // One token points to an implementation, and the other token pointsDi2015NewLine    // to a declaration that the body implementsDi2015NewLine    typeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride(methodBuilder, methodToOverride);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14703057Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string Between(this string src, string findfrom, string findto)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int start = src.IndexOf(findfrom);Di2015NewLine    int to = src.IndexOf(findto, start + findfrom.Length);Di2015NewLine    if (start < 0 || to < 0) return "";Di2015NewLine    string s = src.Substring(Di2015NewLine                   start + findfrom.Length, Di2015NewLine                   to - start - findfrom.Length);Di2015NewLine    return s;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14705277Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Checks if a X509Certificate2 contains Oids for EVDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="certificate"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private static bool IsCertificateEV(X509Certificate2 certificate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // List of valid EV OidsDi2015NewLine        // You can find correct values here:Di2015NewLine        // http://code.google.com/searchframe#OAMlx_jo-ck/src/net/base/ev_root_ca_metadata.cc&exact_package=chromiumDi2015NewLine        // or in WikipediaDi2015NewLine        string[] extendedValidationOids = Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            "1.3.6.1.4.1.34697.2.1",Di2015NewLine            "1.3.6.1.4.1.34697.2.2",Di2015NewLine            "1.3.6.1.4.1.34697.2.1", Di2015NewLine            "1.3.6.1.4.1.34697.2.3", Di2015NewLine            "1.3.6.1.4.1.34697.2.4",Di2015NewLine            "1.2.40.0.17.1.22",Di2015NewLine            "2.16.578.1.26.1.3.3",Di2015NewLine            "1.3.6.1.4.1.17326.10.14.2.1.2", Di2015NewLine            "1.3.6.1.4.1.17326.10.8.12.1.2",Di2015NewLine            "1.3.6.1.4.1.6449.1.2.1.5.1",Di2015NewLine            "2.16.840.1.114412.2.1",Di2015NewLine            "2.16.528.1.1001.1.1.1.12.6.1.1.1",Di2015NewLine            "2.16.840.1.114028.10.1.2",Di2015NewLine            "1.3.6.1.4.1.14370.1.6",Di2015NewLine            "1.3.6.1.4.1.4146.1.1",Di2015NewLine            "2.16.840.1.114413.1.7.23.3",Di2015NewLine            "1.3.6.1.4.1.14777.6.1.1", Di2015NewLine            "1.3.6.1.4.1.14777.6.1.2",Di2015NewLine            "1.3.6.1.4.1.22234.2.5.2.3.1",Di2015NewLine            "1.3.6.1.4.1.782.1.2.1.8.1",Di2015NewLine            "1.3.6.1.4.1.8024.0.2.100.1.2",Di2015NewLine            "1.2.392.200091.100.721.1",Di2015NewLine            "2.16.840.1.114414.1.7.23.3",Di2015NewLine            "1.3.6.1.4.1.23223.2", Di2015NewLine            "1.3.6.1.4.1.23223.1.1.1", Di2015NewLine            "1.3.6.1.5.5.7.1.1",Di2015NewLine            "2.16.756.1.89.1.2.1.1",Di2015NewLine            "2.16.840.1.113733.1.7.48.1",Di2015NewLine // Logic:Di2015NewLine        // Locate Certificate Policy ExtensionDi2015NewLine        // Convert to AsnEncodedData (String)Di2015NewLine        // Check if any of the EV Oids existDi2015NewLine        return (Di2015NewLine                from X509Extension ext in certificate.Extensions Di2015NewLine                where ext.Oid.Value == "2.5.29.32" Di2015NewLine                select new AsnEncodedData(ext.Oid, ext.RawData).Format(true))Di2015NewLine                .Any(asnConvertedData => extendedValidationOids.Where(asnConvertedData.Contains).Any()Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14706294Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic Function CreatePDF(images As System.Collections.Generic.List(Of Byte())) As StringDi2015NewLine        Dim PDFGeneratePath = Server.MapPath("../images/pdfimages/")Di2015NewLine        Dim FileName = "attachmentpdf-" & DateTime.Now.Ticks & ".pdf"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        If images.Count >= 1 ThenDi2015NewLine            Dim document As New Document(PageSize.LETTER)Di2015NewLine            TryDi2015NewLine                ' Create pdfimages directory in images folder.Di2015NewLine                If (Not Directory.Exists(PDFGeneratePath)) ThenDi2015NewLine                    Directory.CreateDirectory(PDFGeneratePath)Di2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                ' we create a writer that listens to the documentDi2015NewLine                ' and directs a PDF-stream to a fileDi2015NewLine                PdfWriter.GetInstance(document, New FileStream(PDFGeneratePath & FileName, FileMode.Create))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                ' opens up the documentDi2015NewLine                document.Open()Di2015NewLine                ' Add metadata to the document.  This information is visible when viewing theDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                ' Set images in tableDi2015NewLine                Dim imageTable As New PdfPTable(2)Di2015NewLine                imageTable.DefaultCell.Border = Rectangle.NO_BORDERDi2015NewLine                imageTable.DefaultCell.HorizontalAlignment = Element.ALIGN_CENTERDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                For ImageIndex As Integer = 0 To images.Count - 1Di2015NewLine                    If (images(ImageIndex) IsNot Nothing) AndAlso (images(ImageIndex).Length > 0) ThenDi2015NewLine                        Dim pic As iTextSharp.text.Image = iTextSharp.text.Image.GetInstance(SRS.Utility.Utils.ByteArrayToImage(images(ImageIndex)), System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        ' Setting image resolutionDi2015NewLine                        If pic.Height > pic.Width ThenDi2015NewLine                            Dim percentage As Single = 0.0FDi2015NewLine                            percentage = 400 / pic.HeightDi2015NewLine                            pic.ScalePercent(percentage * 100)Di2015NewLine                        ElseDi2015NewLine                            Dim percentage As Single = 0.0FDi2015NewLine                            percentage = 240 / pic.WidthDi2015NewLine                            pic.ScalePercent(percentage * 100)Di2015NewLine                        End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        pic.Border = iTextSharp.text.Rectangle.BOXDi2015NewLine                        pic.BorderColor = iTextSharp.text.BaseColor.BLACKDi2015NewLine                        pic.BorderWidth = 3.0FDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        imageTable.AddCell(pic)Di2015NewLine                    End IfDi2015NewLine                    If ((ImageIndex + 1) Mod 6 = 0) ThenDi2015NewLine                        document.Add(imageTable)Di2015NewLine                        document.NewPage()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        imageTable = New PdfPTable(2)Di2015NewLine                        imageTable.DefaultCell.Border = Rectangle.NO_BORDERDi2015NewLine                        imageTable.DefaultCell.HorizontalAlignment = Element.ALIGN_CENTERDi2015NewLine                    End IfDi2015NewLine                    If (ImageIndex = (images.Count - 1)) ThenDi2015NewLine                        imageTable.AddCell(String.Empty)Di2015NewLine                        document.Add(imageTable)Di2015NewLine                        document.NewPage()Di2015NewLine                    End IfDi2015NewLine                NextDi2015NewLine            Catch ex As ExceptionDi2015NewLine                Throw exDi2015NewLine            FinallyDi2015NewLine                ' Close the document objectDi2015NewLine                ' Clean upDi2015NewLine                document.Close()Di2015NewLine                document = NothingDi2015NewLine            End TryDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Return PDFGeneratePath & FileNameDi2015NewLine    End FunctionDi2015NewLine

{Di2015NewLine        var pLen = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(sizeof(int));Di2015NewLine        sysctlbyname(HardwareProperty, IntPtr.Zero, pLen, IntPtr.Zero, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var length = 14712647Di2015UniqueSeparator// The line addEntry('h', "e 50 a 23 i 12 o  7 @ 100") shows the the letterDi2015NewLine// 'h' is followed by 'e' 50% of the time, 'a' 23% of the time, 'i' 12% of Di2015NewLine// the time, 'o' 7% of the time and otherwise some other letter, '@'.Di2015NewLine//Di2015NewLine// Figures are taken from Gaines and tweaked. 14713747Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const int ROWS = 2;Di2015NewLine    const int COLS = 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Button[,] btn = new Button[ROWS,COLS];Di2015NewLine    ComboBox[] cmb = new ComboBox[ROWS];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Form1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        placeRows();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly string[] cbTexts = new string[] { "Monday", "Tuesday" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void createColumns(int rowIndex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int s = rowIndex * 40;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Your original code kept overwriting btn[i] for each column.  You need a 2-D arrayDi2015NewLine        // indexed by the row and columnDi2015NewLine        for (int colIndex = 0; colIndex < COLS; colIndex++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            btn[rowIndex, colIndex] = new Button();Di2015NewLine            btn[rowIndex, colIndex].SetBounds(40 * colIndex, s, 35, 35);Di2015NewLine            btn[rowIndex, colIndex].Text = Convert.ToString(colIndex);Di2015NewLine            btn[rowIndex, colIndex].Tag = cbTexts[colIndex];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            panel1.Controls.Add(btn[rowIndex, colIndex]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cmb[rowIndex] = new ComboBox();Di2015NewLine        cmb[rowIndex].SelectedIndexChanged += new EventHandler(cmb_SelectedIndexChanged);Di2015NewLine        cmb[rowIndex].Text = "Disable";Di2015NewLine        foreach (string cbText in cbTexts)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cmb[rowIndex].Items.Add(cbText);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        cmb[rowIndex].SetBounds(40, s, 70, 70);Di2015NewLine        cmb[rowIndex].Tag = rowIndex; // Store the row index so we know which buttons to affectDi2015NewLine        panel2.Controls.Add(cmb[rowIndex]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void cmb_SelectedIndexChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ComboBox senderCmb = (ComboBox)sender;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int row = (int)senderCmb.Tag;Di2015NewLine        for (int col = 0; col < COLS; col++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Button b = btn[row, col];Di2015NewLine            // These three lines can be combined to one.  I broke it outDi2015NewLine            // just to highlight what is happening.Di2015NewLine            string text = ((string)b.Tag);Di2015NewLine            bool match =  text == senderCmb.SelectedItem.ToString();Di2015NewLine            b.Enabled = match;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void placeRows()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int rowIndex = 0; rowIndex < 2; rowIndex++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            createColumns(rowIndex);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14715809Di2015UniqueSeparatorfor(int index = 0; index < 1250; index++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    switch(byteArray[index])Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         case (byte)'A':Di2015NewLine             index++;Di2015NewLine             int value = BitConverter.ToInt32(byteArray, index);Di2015NewLine             index += 4;Di2015NewLine             break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       case (byte)'B':Di2015NewLine             index++;Di2015NewLine             // Read the next byte as integer.Di2015NewLine             int value = (int)byteArray[index];Di2015NewLine             index++;Di2015NewLine             break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       case (byte)'C':  // string.Di2015NewLine             index++;Di2015NewLine             // Read the next 49 bytes as an string.Di2015NewLine             StringBuilder value = new StringBuilder(49);Di2015NewLine             for(int i = index; i < index + 49; index++)Di2015NewLine             {Di2015NewLine                 if (byteArray[i] == 0) break;Di2015NewLine                 value.Append(Converter.ToChar(byteArray[i]));Di2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLine             index+= 49;Di2015NewLine             break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       case 0:  // Finished.Di2015NewLine             index = 1250;Di2015NewLine             break;Di2015NewLine       default:Di2015NewLine             throw new InvalidArgumentException("Invalid byte array format");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14719114Di2015UniqueSeparatorbyte[] data = { 0x0E, 0xDC, 0x00, 0x1B, 0x80 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// get only first four bytesDi2015NewLinebyte[] bits = new byte[4];Di2015NewLineArray.Copy(data, 0, bits, 0, 4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// reverse array if system uses little endianDi2015NewLineif (BitConverter.IsLittleEndian) {Di2015NewLine  Array.Reverse(bits);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// get a 32 bit integer from the four bytesDi2015NewLineint n = BitConverter.ToInt32(bits, 0); // 0x0EDC001BDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// isolate the 18 bits by shifting and andingDi2015NewLinen >>= 8; // 0x000EDC00Di2015NewLinen &= 0x0003FFFF; // 0x0002DC00Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// reverse by shifting bits out to the right and in from the leftDi2015NewLineint result = 0;Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < 18; i++) {Di2015NewLine  result = (result << 1) + (n & 1);Di2015NewLine  n >>= 1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(result);Di2015NewLine

14730487Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpressionContext context = new ExpressionContext();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Tell FLEE to expect a DateTime result; if the expression evaluates otherwise, Di2015NewLine//throws an ExpressionCompileException when compiling the expressionDi2015NewLinecontext.Options.ResultType = typeof(DateTime);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Instruct FLEE to expose the `DateTime` static members and have Di2015NewLine//them accessible via "DateTime".Di2015NewLine//This mimics the same exact C# syntax to access `DateTime.Now`Di2015NewLinecontext.Imports.AddType(typeof(DateTime), "DateTime");Di2015NewLinecontext.Imports.AddType(typeof(CustomFunctions));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Expose your key variables like HireDate and EnrollmentDateDi2015NewLinecontext.Variables["HireDate"] = GetHireDate(); //DateTime I supposeDi2015NewLinecontext.Variables["EnrollmentDate"] = GetEnrollmentDate(); //DateTime I supposeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Parse the expression, naturally the string would come from your data sourceDi2015NewLineIGenericExpression<DateTime> expression = context.CompileGeneric<DateTime>(GetYourRule(), context);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDateTime date = expression.Evaluate();Di2015NewLine

14733813Di2015UniqueSeparator(?<=\\()         Preceeded by a (Di2015NewLine(?:             Don't bother capturing a groupDi2015NewLine     [^()]+     Match one or more non-bracketsDi2015NewLine     |          ORDi2015NewLine     (?<br>\\()  Capture a (, increment the br countDi2015NewLine     |          ORDi2015NewLine     (?<-br>\\)) Capture a ), decrement the br count or fail if it's 0Di2015NewLine                (failing here will mean we've reached the end of our match)   Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLine*               Zero or more timesDi2015NewLine(?(br)(?!))     Fail if there's the br count is greater than zeroDi2015NewLine                 (Literally, if it's greater than zero, match a (?!);Di2015NewLine                 (?!) means 'not followed by ""', which always fails)Di2015NewLine(?=\\))          Succeeded by a )Di2015NewLine

14734371Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void CreateTableFromReader(string tableName, SqlDataReader reader) {Di2015NewLine  List<string> columns = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine  string createTable = @"CREATE TABLE {0} ({1})";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var dt = reader.GetSchemaTable();Di2015NewLine  foreach (DataRow dr in dt.Rows) {Di2015NewLine    switch (dr["DataTypeName"].ToString().ToLower()) {Di2015NewLine      case "varchar":Di2015NewLine        columns.Add(String.Format("[{0}] {1}({2})",Di2015NewLine          dr["ColumnName"],Di2015NewLine          dr["DataTypeName"],Di2015NewLine          dr["ColumnSize"]Di2015NewLine        ));Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine      case "money": //i know this is redundant but being explicit helps clarity sometimesDi2015NewLine      case "date":Di2015NewLine      case "integer":Di2015NewLine      default:Di2015NewLine        columns.Add(String.Format("[{0}] {1}",Di2015NewLine          dr["ColumnName"],Di2015NewLine          dr["DataTypeName"]Di2015NewLine        ));Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  using (var cmd = conn_Access.CreateCommand()) {Di2015NewLine    cmd.CommandType = CommandType.Text;Di2015NewLine    cmd.CommandText = String.Format(createTable, tableName, String.Join(", ", columns));Di2015NewLine    cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14734422Di2015UniqueSeparatorobject
14734422Di2015UniqueSeparatorBaseType
14734422Di2015UniqueSeparatorType
14734422Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<PropertyInfo> GetOrderedProperties(Type type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<Type, int> lookup = new Dictionary<Type, int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int count = 0;Di2015NewLine    lookup[type] = count++;Di2015NewLine    Type parent = type.BaseType;Di2015NewLine    while (parent != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lookup[parent] = count;Di2015NewLine        count++;Di2015NewLine        parent = parent.BaseType;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return type.GetProperties()Di2015NewLine        .OrderByDescending(prop => lookup[prop.DeclaringType]);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14737572Di2015UniqueSeparatorresult = Regex.Replace(subject, Di2015NewLine    @"\\{                # opening braceDi2015NewLine    (?<key>\\w+)         # Match the key (alnum), capture into the group 'key'Di2015NewLine    -                   # dashDi2015NewLine    (?<value>\\w+)       # Match the value (alnum), capture it as aboveDi2015NewLine    \\}                  # closing braceDi2015NewLine    (?<content>         # Match and capture into the group 'content':Di2015NewLine     (?:                # Match...Di2015NewLine      (?!\\{/?\\k<key>)   # (unless there's an opening or closing tagDi2015NewLine      .                 # of the same name right here) any characterDi2015NewLine     )*                 # any number of timesDi2015NewLine    )                   # End of capturing groupDi2015NewLine    \\{/\\k<key>\\}        # Match the closing tag.", Di2015NewLine    new MatchEvaluator(ComputeReplacement), RegexOptions.Singleline | RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic String ComputeReplacement(Match m) {Di2015NewLine    // You can vary the replacement text for each match on-the-flyDi2015NewLine    // m.Groups["key"].Value will contain the keyDi2015NewLine    // m.Groups["value"].Value will contain the value of the matchDi2015NewLine    // m.Groups["value"].Value will contain the content between the tagsDi2015NewLine    return ""; // change this to return the string you generated hereDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14737624Di2015UniqueSeparator(\\[(?<Tag>[^\\]]+)\\][^\\[]+\\[/\\k<Tag>\\])Di2015NewLine
14737624Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring pattern = @"Di2015NewLine(                # Begin our MatchDi2015NewLine  \\[             # Look for the [ escape anchorDi2015NewLine  (?<Tag>[^\\]]+) # Place anything that is not antother ] into the named match TagDi2015NewLine  \\]             # Anchor of ]Di2015NewLine  [^\\[]+         # Get all the text to the next anchorDi2015NewLine  \\[/            # Anchor of the closing [...] tagDi2015NewLine  \\k<Tag>        # Use the named capture subgroup Tag to balance it outDi2015NewLine  \\]             # Properly closed end tag/node.Di2015NewLine)                # Match is done";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring text = "[TestText]some test text[/TestText] with nothing.";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine (Regex.Replace(text, pattern, "Jabberwocky", RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace));Di2015NewLine// OutputsDi2015NewLine// Jabberwocky with nothing.Di2015NewLine
14737624Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring pattern = @"Di2015NewLine(?(\\[(?<Tag>[^\\]]+)\\][^\\[]+\\[/\\k<Tag>\\]) # If statement to  check []..[/] situationDi2015NewLine  (                                      # Yes it is, match into named capturesDi2015NewLine   \\[Di2015NewLine   (?<Token>[^\\]]+)                      # What is the text inside the [ ], into TokenDi2015NewLine   \\]Di2015NewLine   (?<TextOptional>[^\\[]+)               # Optional text to reuseDi2015NewLine   \\[Di2015NewLine   (?<Closing>/[^\\]]+)                   # The closing tag infoDi2015NewLine   \\]Di2015NewLine  )Di2015NewLine|                                        # Else, let is start a new check for either [] or plain textDi2015NewLine (?(\\[)                                  # If a [ is found it is a token.Di2015NewLine   (                                     # Yes process tokenDi2015NewLine    \\[Di2015NewLine    (?<Token>[^\\]]+)                     # What is the text inside the [ ], into TokenDi2015NewLine    \\]Di2015NewLine   )Di2015NewLine  |                                      # Or (No of the second if) it is just plain textDi2015NewLine  (?<Text>[^\\[]+)                        # Put it into the text match capture.Di2015NewLine )Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLine";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring text = @"Buy [ProductName] [Text]at a great price[/Text] from [ShopName] today.";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine (Di2015NewLineRegex.Replace(text,Di2015NewLine              pattern,Di2015NewLine              new MatchEvaluator((mtch) =>Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                 if (mtch.Groups["Text"].Success)           // If just text, return it.Di2015NewLine                     return mtch.Groups["Text"].Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                 if (mtch.Groups["Closing"].Success)       // If a Closing match capture group reports success, then processDi2015NewLine                 {Di2015NewLine                    return string.Format("Reduced Beyond Comparison (Used to be {0})", mtch.Groups["TextOptional"].Value);Di2015NewLine                 }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                  // Otherwise its just a plain old token, swap it out.Di2015NewLine                  switch ( mtch.Groups["Token"].Value )Di2015NewLine                  {Di2015NewLine                     case "ProductName" : return "Jabberwocky"; break;Di2015NewLine                     case "ShopName"    : return "StackOverFlowiZon"; break;Di2015NewLine                  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                  return "???"; // If we get to here...we have failed...need to determine why.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              }),Di2015NewLine              RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace | RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture));Di2015NewLine// Outputs:Di2015NewLine// Buy Jabberwocky Reduced Beyond Comparison (Used to be at a great price) from StackOverFlowiZon today.Di2015NewLine

14738949Di2015UniqueSeparatorLXRecord
14738949Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<LXRecord> records = new List<LXRecord>();Di2015NewLineLXRecord currentRecord = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach(string line in lines)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int tokenIndex = line.IndexOf(Tokens.TOKEN_SPLITTER);Di2015NewLine    if (tokenIndex < 1 || tokenIndex == line.Length - 1) //no token or no value?Di2015NewLine        continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string token = line.Substring(0, tokenIndex);Di2015NewLine    string value = line.Substring(tokenIndex + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch(token)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case(Tokens.NEW_RECORD) :Di2015NewLine            currentRecord = new LXRecord();Di2015NewLine            records.Add(currentRecord);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case(Tokens.ITEM_NUMBER) :Di2015NewLine            currentRecord.ItemNumber = value;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case(Tokens.LAST_NAME) :Di2015NewLine            currentRecord.LastName = value;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case(Tokens.DATE) :Di2015NewLine            currentRecord.Date = value;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case(Tokens.ERROR) :Di2015NewLine            currentRecord.Errors.Add(value);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14738949Di2015UniqueSeparatorParseName
14738949Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void ParseName(LXRecord record, string value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int tokenIndex = value.IndexOf(Tokens.TOKEN_SPLITTER);Di2015NewLine    if (tokenIndex < 1 || tokenIndex == value.Length - 1) //no last name and first name?Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        record.LastName = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        record.LastName = value.Substring(0, tokenIndex);Di2015NewLine        record.FirstName = value.Substring(tokenIndex + 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14744300Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void ExecuteSqlTransaction(string connectionString)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (SqlConnection connection = new SqlConnection(connectionString))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        connection.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SqlCommand command = connection.CreateCommand();Di2015NewLine        SqlTransaction transaction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Start a local transaction.Di2015NewLine        transaction = connection.BeginTransaction("SampleTransaction");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Must assign both transaction object and connection Di2015NewLine        // to Command object for a pending local transactionDi2015NewLine        command.Connection = connection;Di2015NewLine        command.Transaction = transaction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            command.CommandText =Di2015NewLine                "Insert into Region (RegionID, RegionDescription) VALUES (100, 'Description')";Di2015NewLine            command.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine            command.CommandText =Di2015NewLine                "Insert into Region (RegionID, RegionDescription) VALUES (101, 'Description')";Di2015NewLine            command.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Attempt to commit the transaction.Di2015NewLine            transaction.Commit();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Both records are written to database.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Commit Exception Type: {0}", ex.GetType());Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("  Message: {0}", ex.Message);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Attempt to roll back the transaction. Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                transaction.Rollback();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex2)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // This catch block will handle any errors that may have occurred Di2015NewLine                // on the server that would cause the rollback to fail, such as Di2015NewLine                // a closed connection.Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Rollback Exception Type: {0}", ex2.GetType());Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("  Message: {0}", ex2.Message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14744975Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void ConvertToXml(Stream inputStream, Stream outputStream)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const int oneIdentLegth = 4; // One level indentation - four spaces.Di2015NewLine    var xmlWriterSettings = new XmlWriterSettingsDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Indent = trueDi2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var streamReader = new StreamReader(inputStream))Di2015NewLine    using (var xmlWriter = XmlWriter.Create(outputStream, xmlWriterSettings))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int previousIndent = -1; // There is no previous indent.Di2015NewLine        string line;Di2015NewLine        while ((line = streamReader.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var indent = line.TakeWhile(ch => ch == ' ').Count();Di2015NewLine            indent /= oneIdentLegth;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var elementName = line.Trim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (indent <= previousIndent)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // The indent is the same or is less than previous one - write end for previous element.Di2015NewLine                xmlWriter.WriteEndElement();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var identDelta = previousIndent - indent;Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < identDelta; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Return: leave the node.Di2015NewLine                    xmlWriter.WriteEndElement();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            xmlWriter.WriteStartElement(elementName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Save the indent of the previous line.Di2015NewLine            previousIndent = indent;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14744975Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing (var inputStream = File.OpenRead(@"Input file path"))Di2015NewLineusing (var outputStream = File.Create(@"Output file path"))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ConvertToXml(inputStream, outputStream);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14746374Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static UIElement FindUid(this DependencyObject parent, string uid)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var count = VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(parent);Di2015NewLine    if (count == 0) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var el = VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(parent, i) as UIElement;Di2015NewLine        if (el == null) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (el.Uid == uid) return el;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        el = el.FindUid(uid);Di2015NewLine        if (el != null) return el;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14747446Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int BinarySearch(Student student)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Search the entire rangeDi2015NewLine    int min = 0;Di2015NewLine    int max = Attendees.Length;Di2015NewLine    int mid = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Find the pivot elementDi2015NewLine        mid = min + ((max - min) / 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // CompareDi2015NewLine        int comparison = student.CompareTo(Attendees[mid]);Di2015NewLine        if (comparison < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            max = mid;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (comparison > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            min = mid;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    while (min < max && comparison != 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (comparison != 0)Di2015NewLine        return -1;Di2015NewLine    return mid;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14751275Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string SetDefaultStringValues(this TestClass testClass)   Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder returnLogBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    // # Get all properties of testClass instanceDi2015NewLine    PropertyDescriptorCollection propDescCollection = TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(testClass);Di2015NewLine    // # Iterate over the property collectionDi2015NewLine    foreach (PropertyDescriptor property in propDescCollection)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string name = property.Name;Di2015NewLine        Type t = property.PropertyType; // # Get property typeDi2015NewLine        object value = property.GetValue(testClass); // # Get value of the property (value that member variable holds)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (t == typeof(string)) // # If type of propery is string and value is nullDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            property.SetValue(testClass, String.Empty); // # Set value of the property (set member variable)Di2015NewLine            value = String.Empty; // # <-- To prevent NullReferenceException when printing outDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        returnLogBuilder.AppendLine("*****\\nName:\\t{0}\\nType:\\t{1}\\nValue:\\t{2}", name, t.ToString(), value.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    returnLogBuilder.AppendLine("*****");Di2015NewLine    return returnLogBuilder.toString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14751294Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void DrawPercentages(int[] percentages, Color[] colorsToUse)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // Create a Graphics object to draw on the pictureboxDi2015NewLine   Graphics G = pictureBox1.CreateGraphics();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // Calculate the number of pixels per 1 percentDi2015NewLine   float pixelsPerPercent = pictureBox1.Height / 100f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // Keep track of the height at which to start drawing (starting from the bottom going up)Di2015NewLine   int drawHeight = pictureBox1.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // Loop through all percentages and draw a rectangle for eachDi2015NewLine   for (int i = 0; i < percentages.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       // Create a brush with the current colorDi2015NewLine       SolidBrush brush = new SolidBrush(colorsToUse[i]);Di2015NewLine       // Update the height at which the next rectangle is drawn.Di2015NewLine       drawHeight -= (int)(pixelsPerPercent * percentages[i]);Di2015NewLine       // Draw a filled rectangleDi2015NewLine       G.FillRectangle(brush, 0, drawHeight, pictureBox1.Width, pixelsPerPercent * percentages[i]);Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14752549Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic Class LocalStorageDi2015NewLine    Implements ILocalStorageDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Private Const _CompanyUrl As String = "http://www.mycompany.com"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Public Function Read(Of T)(ByVal fileName As String) As TDi2015NewLine        Dim contents As T = NothingDi2015NewLine        Dim serializer As XmlSerializer = New XmlSerializer(GetType(T))Di2015NewLine        TryDi2015NewLine            Using stream As Stream = New IsolatedStorageFileStream(fileName, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, GetStorage())Di2015NewLine                Using xmlReader As XmlReader = New XmlTextReader(stream)Di2015NewLine                    contents = CType(serializer.Deserialize(xmlReader), T)Di2015NewLine                End UsingDi2015NewLine            End UsingDi2015NewLine        Catch ex As FileNotFoundExceptionDi2015NewLine        Catch ex As ExceptionDi2015NewLine            Throw New IOException("Failed to read from " + fileName + " in local isolated storage", ex)Di2015NewLine        End TryDi2015NewLine        Return contentsDi2015NewLine    End FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Public Sub Write(Of T)(ByVal fileName As String, ByVal serializableDataObject As T)Di2015NewLine        Dim serializer As XmlSerializer = New XmlSerializer(GetType(T))Di2015NewLine        TryDi2015NewLine            Using stream As Stream = New IsolatedStorageFileStream(fileName, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write, GetStorage())Di2015NewLine                Using xmlTextWriter As XmlTextWriter = New XmlTextWriter(stream, New UTF8Encoding(False))Di2015NewLine                    xmlTextWriter.Formatting = Formatting.IndentedDi2015NewLine                    Dim namespaces As XmlSerializerNamespaces = New XmlSerializerNamespaces()Di2015NewLine                    namespaces.Add("", "")Di2015NewLine                    serializer.Serialize(xmlTextWriter, serializableDataObject, namespaces)Di2015NewLine                End UsingDi2015NewLine            End UsingDi2015NewLine        Catch ex As ExceptionDi2015NewLine            Throw New IOException("Failed to write to " & fileName & " in local isolated storage", ex)Di2015NewLine        End TryDi2015NewLine    End SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Private Function GetStorage() As IsolatedStorageFileDi2015NewLine        Return IsolatedStorageFile.GetStore(IsolatedStorageScope.Machine Or IsolatedStorageScope.Assembly, Nothing, New Url(_CompanyUrl))Di2015NewLine    End FunctionDi2015NewLineEnd ClassDi2015NewLine

14752834Di2015UniqueSeparatorTaskFactory.FromAsync
14752834Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class MyAzureExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public static Task<BrokeredMessage> ReceiveAsync(this QueueClient @this,Di2015NewLine      TimeSpan serverWaitTime)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return Task<BrokeredMessage>.Factory.FromAsync(Di2015NewLine        @this.BeginReceive, @this.EndReceive, serverWaitTime, null);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static Task CompleteAsync(this BrokeredMessage @this)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return Task.Factory.FromAsync(@this.BeginComplete, @this.EndComplete, null);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14752834Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{    Di2015NewLine  var connectionString = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings["Microsoft.ServiceBus.ConnectionString"];Di2015NewLine  _queueClient = QueueClient.CreateFromConnectionString(connectionString, "MyQueue");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  for (var i = 0; i < 25; i++ )Di2015NewLine    MyMessageReceiveAsync();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine("Waiting for messages...");Di2015NewLine  Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  _queueClient.Close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static async Task MyMessageReceiveAsync()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  while (true)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    using (var message = await _queueClient.ReceiveAsync(TimeSpan.FromMinutes(5)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      tryDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        var msg = message.GetBody<string>();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Message: " + msg);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_queueClient.Mode == ReceiveMode.PeekLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          // Mark brokered message as completed at which point it's removed from the queue.Di2015NewLine          await message.CompleteAsync();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        if (_queueClient.Mode == ReceiveMode.PeekLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          // unlock the message and make it available Di2015NewLine          message.Abandon();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Exception was thrown: " + ex.GetBaseException().Message);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14755877Di2015UniqueSeparator// Create a common interface that all singletons use. This allows Di2015NewLine// us to add them all to a list.Di2015NewLineinterface ISingleton { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Singleton<T> : ISingletonDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Store our list of ISingletonsDi2015NewLine    static List<ISingleton> instances = new List<ISingleton>();Di2015NewLine    static T instance;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected Singleton() { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T GetInstance()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Either return the existing instnace, or create a new oneDi2015NewLine        if (Singleton<T>.instance == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Singleton<T>.instance = (T)Activator.CreateInstance(typeof(T));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Use a common interface so they can all be stored together.Di2015NewLine            // Avoids the previously mentioned co-variance problem.Di2015NewLine            // Also, compiler isn't built to follow curious recursiveness,Di2015NewLine            // so use a dynamic statement to force runtime re-evaluation of Di2015NewLine            // the type hierarchy. Try to avoid dynamic statements in generalDi2015NewLine            // but in this case its useful.Di2015NewLine            instances.Add((dynamic)Singleton<T>.instance);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Singleton<T>.instance;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass MyClass : Singleton<MyClass>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MyClass my = MyClass.GetInstance();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14763282Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class IntervalChangeReaderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // My state between ticks.Di2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<SomeEntity> knowEntities;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Reads the data from the db and uses knowEntities to determine adds, changes, Di2015NewLine    // and deletes which are exposed through properties.Di2015NewLine    private DbReaderAndChangeChecker checker;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private EntityChangeSet lastChangeResult;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IntervalChangeReader(DbReaderAndChangeChecker checker)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.checker = checker;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // I like to use Do instead of just combining this all into Select to make the side effect obvious.Di2015NewLine        this.Changes = Observable.Interval(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(seconds), scheduler).Do(Di2015NewLine            x =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var changes = DbReaderAndChangeChecker.Refresh(this.knownXRefs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Make changes to knownXRefs which is my state.Di2015NewLine                    this.knownXRefs.AddRange(changes.Added);Di2015NewLine                    this.knownXRefs.RemoveAll(y => changes.Removed.Any(z => z.Id == y.Id));Di2015NewLine                    this.knownXRefs.RemoveAll(y => changes.Changed.Any(z => z.Id == y.Id));Di2015NewLine                    this.knownXRefs.AddRange(changes.Changed);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    lastChangeResult = changes;Di2015NewLine                }).Select(x => this.lastChangeResult);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IObservable<EntityChangeSet> Changes { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14763894Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ViewModel : INotifyPropertyChangedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Set up our collection to be read from the ViewDi2015NewLine    public ObservableCollection<String> Collection { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This collection will maintain the selected itemsDi2015NewLine    public ObservableCollection<String> SelectedItems { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ViewModel()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // InstantiateDi2015NewLine        this.Collection = new ObservableCollection<String>();Di2015NewLine        this.SelectedItems = new ObservableCollection<String>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Now let's monitor when this.SelectdItems changesDi2015NewLine        this.SelectedItems.CollectionChanged += SelectedItems_CollectionChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Fill our collection with some strings (1 to 10).Di2015NewLine        // (1) Generate the numbers 1 - 10Di2015NewLine        // (2) Convert each number to a stringDi2015NewLine        // (3) Cast into a list so we can use foreach Di2015NewLine        // (4) Add each item to the collection.Di2015NewLine        Enumerable.Range(1, 10)Di2015NewLine            .Select(number => number.ToString())   Di2015NewLine            .ToList()                              Di2015NewLine            .ForEach(this.Collection.Add);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Remember! Never reset the ObservableCollection.Di2015NewLine        // That is, never say this.Collection = new... (or you'll break the binding).Di2015NewLine        // instead use this.Collection.Clear(), and then add the items you want to addDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void SelectedItems_CollectionChanged(object sender, System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.Action == System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (String str in this.SelectedItems)Di2015NewLine                System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine("New item added {0}", str);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event PropertyChangedEventHandler PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14763894Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ListBoxEx : ListBoxDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Use the 'new' keyword so that we 'hide' the base property.Di2015NewLine    // This means that binding will go to this version of SelectedItemsDi2015NewLine    // rather than whatever the base class uses. To reach the base 'SelectedItems' propertyDi2015NewLine    // We just need to use base.SelectedItems instead of this.SelectedItemsDi2015NewLine    // Note that we register as an observable collection.Di2015NewLine    new DependencyProperty SelectedItemsProperty = Di2015NewLine        DependencyProperty.Register("SelectedItems", typeof(ObservableCollection<String>), typeof(ListBoxEx));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Accessor. Again, note the 'new'.Di2015NewLine    new public ObservableCollection<String> SelectedItemsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (ObservableCollection<String>) GetValue(SelectedItemsProperty); }Di2015NewLine        set { SetValue(SelectedItemsProperty, value); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnSelectionChanged(SelectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Guard against ViewModel being nullDi2015NewLine        if (this.SelectedItems != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Clear the listDi2015NewLine            this.SelectedItems.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // (1) On selection changed. Get the new base.SelectedItemsDi2015NewLine            // (2) Cast each item to a String ("Make a string collection")Di2015NewLine            // (3) Cast to list, and use foreach to add each item to Di2015NewLine            // this.SelectedItems (note this is different from the original base.SelectedItems)Di2015NewLine            base.SelectedItems.Cast<String>()Di2015NewLine                .ToList()Di2015NewLine                .ForEach(this.SelectedItems.Add);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14765248Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal static class ExtensionMethodsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    internal static object ConvertToRCW(this object o)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var guid = o.GetCLSID();Di2015NewLine        if (guid != Guid.Empty)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Marshal.CreateWrapperOfType(o, o.GetTypeFromGuid(guid));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return o;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static Guid GetCLSID(this object o)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Guid guid = Guid.Empty;Di2015NewLine        var p = o as IPersist;Di2015NewLine        if (p != null)Di2015NewLine            p.GetClassID(out guid);Di2015NewLine        return guid;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static Type GetTypeFromGuid(this object o, Guid guid)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var assemblies = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var assembly in assemblies)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var types = assembly.GetLoadableTypes();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var type in types)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (type.GUID == guid)Di2015NewLine                    return type;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return o.GetType();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static IEnumerable<Type> GetLoadableTypes(this Assembly assembly)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return assembly.GetTypes();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (ReflectionTypeLoadException e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return e.Types.Where(t => t != null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14765967Di2015UniqueSeparator//Move this out of the function, if you are wondering why search SO for "Not random" and choose any of the 100's of people asking "why is random not random?" :)Di2015NewLineprivate static Random randomCard = new Random(); //Not thread safe, if multi-threading use locks!!!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void Shuffle(List<Card> cardDeck)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int index = 0;Di2015NewLine    List<Card> tempDeck = new List<Card>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (cardDeck.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int removal = randomCard.Next(0, cardDeck.Count);Di2015NewLine        Card tempCard = cardDeck[removal];Di2015NewLine        cardDeck.RemoveAt(removal);Di2015NewLine        tempDeck.Add(tempCard);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //cardDeck is empty at this point, now we refill it with our randomized deck.Di2015NewLine    cardDeck.AddRange(tempDeck);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14765967Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<Card> Shuffle(List<Card> cardDeck)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int index = 0;Di2015NewLine    List<Card> tempDeck = new List<Card>();Di2015NewLine    List<Card> localCopy = new List<Card>(cardDeck);   //Creates a shallow copy of the list.      Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (localCopy.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int removal = randomCard.Next(0, cardDeck.Count);Di2015NewLine        Card tempCard = localCopy[removal];Di2015NewLine        localCopy.RemoveAt(removal);Di2015NewLine        tempDeck.Add(tempCard);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return tempDeck;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14766350Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrincipalContext oCtx = new PrincipalContext(ContextType.Domain);Di2015NewLineComputerPrincipal oPrincipal = ComputerPrincipal.FindByIdentity(oCtx, computerName);Di2015NewLinestring dn = oPrincipal.DistinguishedName;Di2015NewLine
14766511Di2015UniqueSeparator private class ReplaceEvaluatorFindAndHighlight : IReplacingCallbackDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// This method is called by the Aspose.Words find and replace engine for each match.Di2015NewLine        /// This method highlights the match string, even if it spans multiple runs.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        ReplaceAction IReplacingCallback.Replacing(ReplacingArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // This is a Run node that contains either the beginning or the complete match.Di2015NewLine            Node currentNode = e.MatchNode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // The first (and may be the only) run can contain text before the match, Di2015NewLine            // in this case it is necessary to split the run.Di2015NewLine            if (e.MatchOffset > 0)Di2015NewLine                currentNode = SplitRun((Run)currentNode, e.MatchOffset);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // This array is used to store all nodes of the match for further highlighting.Di2015NewLine            List<Node> runs = new List<Node>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Find all runs that contain parts of the match string.Di2015NewLine            int remainingLength = e.Match.Value.Length;Di2015NewLine            while (Di2015NewLine                (remainingLength > 0) &&Di2015NewLine                (currentNode != null) &&Di2015NewLine                (currentNode.GetText().Length <= remainingLength))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                runs.Add(currentNode);Di2015NewLine                remainingLength = remainingLength - currentNode.GetText().Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Select the next Run node. Di2015NewLine                // Have to loop because there could be other nodes such as BookmarkStart etc.Di2015NewLine                doDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    currentNode = currentNode.NextSibling;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                while ((currentNode != null) && (currentNode.NodeType != NodeType.Run));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Split the last run that contains the match if there is any text left.Di2015NewLine            if ((currentNode != null) && (remainingLength > 0))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                SplitRun((Run)currentNode, remainingLength);Di2015NewLine                runs.Add(currentNode);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Now highlight all runs in the sequence.Di2015NewLine            foreach (Run run in runs)Di2015NewLine                run.Font.HighlightColor = Color.Red;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Signal to the replace engine to do nothing because we have already done all what we wanted.Di2015NewLine            return ReplaceAction.Skip;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Splits text of the specified run into two runs.Di2015NewLine        /// Inserts the new run just after the specified run.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private static Run SplitRun(Run run, int position)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Run afterRun = (Run)run.Clone(true);Di2015NewLine            afterRun.Text = run.Text.Substring(position);Di2015NewLine            run.Text = run.Text.Substring(0, position);Di2015NewLine            run.ParentNode.InsertAfter(afterRun, run);Di2015NewLine            return afterRun;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14767029Di2015UniqueSeparator    void SendText(string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int len = text.Length;Di2015NewLine        int inputsSize = len*2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //INPUT[] inputs = new INPUT[inputsSize];Di2015NewLine        INPUT[] inputs = new INPUT[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < len; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            INPUT inp = new INPUT();Di2015NewLine            inp.type = 1; //INPUT_KEYBOARD;Di2015NewLine            inp.U.ki.dwFlags = KEYEVENTF.UNICODE;Di2015NewLine            inp.U.ki.time = 0;Di2015NewLine            inp.U.ki.wVk = 0;Di2015NewLine            inp.U.ki.wScan = (short)text[i];Di2015NewLine            inp.U.ki.dwExtraInfo = GetMessageExtraInfo();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //inputs[i] = inp;Di2015NewLine            inputs[0] = inp;Di2015NewLine            SendInput(1, inputs, INPUT.Size);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            inp = new INPUT();Di2015NewLine            inp.type = 1; //INPUT_KEYBOARD;Di2015NewLine            inp.U.ki.dwFlags = KEYEVENTF.KEYUP | KEYEVENTF.UNICODE;Di2015NewLine            inp.U.ki.time = 0;Di2015NewLine            inp.U.ki.wVk = 0;Di2015NewLine            inp.U.ki.wScan = (short)text[i];Di2015NewLine            inp.U.ki.dwExtraInfo = GetMessageExtraInfo();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //inputs[i + 1] = inp;Di2015NewLine            inputs[0] = inp;Di2015NewLine            SendInput(1, inputs, INPUT.Size);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //SendInput((uint)inputsSize, inputs, INPUT.Size);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14767307Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] ToByteArray(short s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //return, if `short` can be cast to `byte` without overflowDi2015NewLine    if (s <= byte.MaxValue) Di2015NewLine        return new byte[] { (byte)s };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<byte> bytes = new List<byte>();Di2015NewLine    byte b = 0;Di2015NewLine    //determine delta through the number of digitsDi2015NewLine    short delta = (short)Math.Pow(10, s.ToString().Length - 3);Di2015NewLine    //as soon as byte can be not more than 3 digits lengthDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //take first 3 (or 2, or 1) digits from the high-order digitDi2015NewLine        short temp = (short)(s / delta);Di2015NewLine        if (temp > byte.MaxValue) //if it's still too bigDi2015NewLine            delta *= 10;Di2015NewLine        else //the byte is found, break the loopDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            b = (byte)temp;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //add the found byteDi2015NewLine    bytes.Add(b);Di2015NewLine    //recursively search in the rest of the numberDi2015NewLine    bytes.AddRange(ToByteArray((short)(s % delta))); Di2015NewLine    return bytes.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
