14767643Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate IEnumerable<Ticket> GetTickets()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Try to get the tickets from the cache first:Di2015NewLine    var tickets = MemoryCache.Default["tickets"] as IEnumerable<Ticket>;Di2015NewLine    if (tickets == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // not found in cache, let's fetch them from the database:Di2015NewLine        tickets = db.Tickets.ToList();Di2015NewLine        // and now store them into the cache so that next time they will be availableDi2015NewLine        MemoryCache.Default.Add("tickets", tickets, new CacheItemPolicy { Priority = CacheItemPriority.NotRemovable });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return tickets;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14767699Di2015UniqueSeparatorRegex.Replace
14767699Di2015UniqueSeparatorMatchEvaluator
14767699Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ReplacerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Replace(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // The regular expression passed as the second argument to the Replace methodDi2015NewLine        // matches strings in the format "{value0#value1/value2}", i.e. three stringsDi2015NewLine        // separated by "#" and "/" all surrounded by braces.Di2015NewLine        var result = Regex.Replace(Di2015NewLine            input,Di2015NewLine            @"{(?<value0>[^#]+)#(?<value1>[^/]+)/(?<value2>[^}]+)}",Di2015NewLine            ReplaceMatchEvaluator);Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string ReplaceMatchEvaluator(Match m)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // m.Value contains the matched string including the braces.Di2015NewLine        // This method is invoked once per matching portion of the input string.Di2015NewLine        // We can then extract each of the named groups in order to access theDi2015NewLine        // substrings of each matching portion as follows:Di2015NewLine        var value0 = m.Groups["value0"].Value; // Contains first value, e.g. "Jwala Vora"Di2015NewLine        var value1 = m.Groups["value1"].Value; // Contains second value, e.g. "3"Di2015NewLine        var value2 = m.Groups["value2"].Value; // Contains third value, e.g. "13"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Here we can do things like convert value1 and value2 to integers...Di2015NewLine        var intValue1 = Int32.Parse(value1);Di2015NewLine        var intValue2 = Int32.Parse(value2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // etc.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Here we return the value with which the matching portion is replaced.Di2015NewLine        // This would be some function of value0, value1 and value2 as well asDi2015NewLine        // any other data in the Replacer class.Di2015NewLine        return "xyz";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var replacer = new Replacer();Di2015NewLine        var result = replacer.Replace("Proposal is given to {Jwala Vora#3/13} for {Amazon Vally#2/11} {1#3/75} by {MdOffice employee#1/1}");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(result);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14770416Di2015UniqueSeparatorWebClient wc = new WebClient();Di2015NewLinewc.UploadStringCompleted += new UploadStringCompletedEventHandler(wc_UploadStringCompleted);Di2015NewLinewc.Headers["Content-Type"] = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLinewc.Encoding = Encoding.UTF8;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineParameters prms = new Parameters();Di2015NewLineprms.AddPair("email", email);Di2015NewLineprms.AddPair("password", password);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinewc.UploadStringAsync(new Uri(loginUrl), "POST", prms.FormPostData(), null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void wc_UploadStringCompleted(object sender, UploadStringCompletedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        // e.Result will contain the page's outputDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This is my Parameters and Parameter Object classesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ParametersDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinepublic List<ParameterObject> prms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Parameters()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            prms = new List<ParameterObject>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void AddPair(string id, string val)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            prms.Add(new ParameterObject(id, val));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public String FormPostData()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder buffer = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < prms.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (i == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    buffer.Append(System.Net.HttpUtility.UrlEncode(prms[i].id) + "=" + System.Net.HttpUtility.UrlEncode(prms[i].value));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    buffer.Append("&" + System.Net.HttpUtility.UrlEncode(prms[i].id) + "=" + System.Net.HttpUtility.UrlEncode(prms[i].value));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return buffer.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ParameterObjectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string id;Di2015NewLine    public string value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ParameterObject(string id, string val)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.id = id;Di2015NewLine        this.value = val;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14770689Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var list = new List<SubmissionLog>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        new SubmissionLog(1, 123, "1/24/2013 01:00:00", 1),Di2015NewLine        new SubmissionLog(2, 456, "1/24/2013 01:30:00", 1),Di2015NewLine        new SubmissionLog(3, 123, "1/25/2013 21:00:00", 2),Di2015NewLine        new SubmissionLog(4, 456, "1/25/2013 21:30:00", 2),Di2015NewLine        new SubmissionLog(5, 123, "2/25/2013 22:00:00", 1),Di2015NewLine        new SubmissionLog(6, 123, "2/26/2013 21:00:00", 2),Di2015NewLine        new SubmissionLog(7, 123, "2/16/2013 21:30:00", 1),Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // split out status 1 and 2Di2015NewLine    var s1s = list.Where (l => l.StatusId == 1).OrderBy (l => l.Created);Di2015NewLine    var s2s = list.Where (l => l.StatusId == 2).OrderBy (l => l.Created);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // use a sub-query to get the first s2 after each s1Di2015NewLine    var q = s1s.Select (s1 => new Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            s1, Di2015NewLine            s2 = s2s.FirstOrDefault (s2 => Di2015NewLine                s1.SubmissionId == s2.SubmissionId &&Di2015NewLine                s2.Created >= s1.Created    Di2015NewLine            )Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    ).Where (s => s.s1.PKId < s.s2.PKId && s.s2 != null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // extract the info we need Di2015NewLine        // note that TotalSecond is ok in Linq to Object but you'll Di2015NewLine        // probably need to use SqlFunctions or equivalent if this is to Di2015NewLine        // run against a DB.Di2015NewLine    var q1 = q.Select (x => new Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Start=x.s1.Created,Di2015NewLine            End=x.s2.Created,Di2015NewLine            SubmissionId=x.s1.SubmissionId, Di2015NewLine            Seconds=(x.s2.Created - x.s1.Created).TotalSecondsDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // group by submissionId and average the timeDi2015NewLine    var q2 = q1.GroupBy (x => x.SubmissionId).Select (x => new {Di2015NewLine        x.Key, Di2015NewLine        Count=x.Count (),Di2015NewLine        Start=x.Min (y => y.Start),Di2015NewLine        End=x.Max (y => y.End),Di2015NewLine        Average=x.Average (y => y.Seconds)});Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SubmissionLogDi2015NewLine{  Di2015NewLine    public SubmissionLog(int id, int submissionId, string date, int statusId)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PKId = id;Di2015NewLine        SubmissionId = submissionId;Di2015NewLine        Created = DateTime.Parse(date, CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture("en-US"));Di2015NewLine        StatusId = statusId;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int PKId {get;set;}  Di2015NewLine    public int SubmissionId {get;set;}  Di2015NewLine    public DateTime Created {get;set;}   Di2015NewLine    public int StatusId {get;set;}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14779493Di2015UniqueSeparator    static public string CsvQuote(this string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (text == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool containsQuote = false;Di2015NewLine        bool containsComma = false;Di2015NewLine        int len = text.Length;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < len && (containsComma == false || containsQuote == false); i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            char ch = text[i];Di2015NewLine            if (ch == '"')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                containsQuote = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (ch == ',')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                containsComma = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool mustQuote = containsComma || containsQuote;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (containsQuote)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            text = text.Replace("\\"", "\\"\\"");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (mustQuote)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "\\"" + text + "\\"";  // Quote the cell and replace embedded quotes with double-quoteDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return text;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class ListViewBindableSelectionHandlerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private ListViewBase _listView;Di2015NewLine        private dynamic private void OnListViewSelectionChanged(Di2015NewLine            object sender, SelectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (dynamic item in 14785323Di2015UniqueSeparatorAt 1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM +00:00, Busy Signal Indicator is now:OFFDi2015NewLineSending BUSY at 1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM +00:00Di2015NewLineSending NOTBUSY at 1/1/0001 12:00:02 AM +00:00Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSending BUSY at 1/1/0001 12:00:03 AM +00:00Di2015NewLineSending BUSY at 1/1/0001 12:00:06 AM +00:00Di2015NewLineAt 1/1/0001 12:00:08 AM +00:00, Busy Signal Indicator is now:ONDi2015NewLineSending NOTBUSY at 1/1/0001 12:00:09 AM +00:00Di2015NewLineAt 1/1/0001 12:00:09 AM +00:00, Busy Signal Indicator is now:OFFDi2015NewLine
14785323Di2015UniqueSeparatorenum EventType Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    Busy, Di2015NewLine    NotBusy Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass StreamEvent Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine     public EventType Type {get; set;} Di2015NewLine     public StreamEvent(EventType type) { Type = type;}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14785323Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // our simulated event streamDi2015NewLine    var fakeSource = new System.Reactive.Subjects.Subject<StreamEvent>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Let's use a scheduler we actually don't have to wait forDi2015NewLine    var theTardis = new System.Reactive.Concurrency.HistoricalScheduler();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var busySignal = fakeSourceDi2015NewLine        // Batch up events:Di2015NewLine        .Window(Di2015NewLine            // Starting batching on a busy signalDi2015NewLine            fakeSource.Where(e => e.Type == EventType.Busy),Di2015NewLine            // Stop batching on a not busy signalDi2015NewLine            (open) => fakeSource.Where(e => e.Type == EventType.NotBusy)Di2015NewLine                // but throw a timeout if we exceed 5 seconds per windowDi2015NewLine                .Timeout(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(5), theTardis))       Di2015NewLine        // Unpack the windowsDi2015NewLine        .Switch()Di2015NewLine        // Catch any timeout exception and inject a NULL into the stream        Di2015NewLine        .Catch(fakeSource.StartWith((StreamEvent)null))Di2015NewLine        // Bool-ify on "did a timeout happen?"Di2015NewLine        .Select(e => e == null)Di2015NewLine        // Start in an "unbusy" stateDi2015NewLine        .StartWith(false)Di2015NewLine        // And only tell us about transitionsDi2015NewLine        .DistinctUntilChanged();    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using(busySignal.Subscribe(signal => Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("At {0}, Busy Signal Indicator is now:{1}",Di2015NewLine            theTardis.Now,Di2015NewLine            signal ? "ON" : "OFF")))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // should not generate a busy signalDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Sending BUSY at {0}", theTardis.Now);Di2015NewLine        fakeSource.OnNext(new StreamEvent(EventType.Busy));Di2015NewLine        theTardis.AdvanceBy(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(2));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Sending NOTBUSY at {0}", theTardis.Now);Di2015NewLine        fakeSource.OnNext(new StreamEvent(EventType.NotBusy));Di2015NewLine        theTardis.AdvanceBy(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(1));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // should generate a busy signalDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Sending BUSY at {0}", theTardis.Now);Di2015NewLine        fakeSource.OnNext(new StreamEvent(EventType.Busy));Di2015NewLine        theTardis.AdvanceBy(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(3));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Sending BUSY at {0}", theTardis.Now);Di2015NewLine        fakeSource.OnNext(new StreamEvent(EventType.Busy));Di2015NewLine        theTardis.AdvanceBy(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(3));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // and this should clear itDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Sending NOTBUSY at {0}", theTardis.Now);Di2015NewLine        fakeSource.OnNext(new StreamEvent(EventType.NotBusy));      Di2015NewLine        theTardis.AdvanceBy(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(1));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();    Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14785725Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<string> p2 = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine 14790533Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void UpdateGlowWindow(bool isActivated = false) {Di2015NewLine    if(this.DisableComposite || this.IsMaximized) {Di2015NewLine        this.glowWindow.Visibility = System.Windows.Visibility.Collapsed;Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        this.glowWindow.Left = this.Left - 10;Di2015NewLine        this.glowWindow.Top = this.Top - 10;Di2015NewLine        this.glowWindow.Width = this.Width + 20;Di2015NewLine        this.glowWindow.Height = this.Height + 20;Di2015NewLine        this.glowWindow.Visibility = System.Windows.Visibility.Visible;Di2015NewLine        if(!isActivated)Di2015NewLine            this.glowWindow.Activate();Di2015NewLine    } catch(Exception) {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14790533Di2015UniqueSeparatorWndProc
14790533Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// An application-defined function that processes messages sent to a window. The WNDPROC typeDi2015NewLine/// defines a pointer to this callback function.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="hwnd">A handle to the window.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="uMsg">The message.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="wParam">Additional message information. The contents of this parameter depend onDi2015NewLine/// the value of the uMsg parameter.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="lParam">Additional message information. The contents of this parameter depend onDi2015NewLine/// the value of the uMsg parameter.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="handled">Reference to boolean value which indicates whether a message was handled.Di2015NewLine/// </param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>The return value is the result of the message processing and depends on the message sent.Di2015NewLine/// </returns>Di2015NewLineprivate IntPtr WindowProc(IntPtr hwnd, int uMsg, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam, ref bool handled) {Di2015NewLine    // BEGIN UNMANAGED WIN32Di2015NewLine    switch((WinRT.Message)uMsg) {Di2015NewLine 0;Di2015NewLine                    if(!this.IsMaximized)Di2015NewLine                        this.IsMaximized = true;Di2015NewLine                    this.UpdateChrome();Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case WinRT.Size.SIZE_RESTORED:Di2015NewLine                    if(this.IsMaximized)Di2015NewLine                        this.IsMaximized = false;Di2015NewLine                    this.UpdateChrome();Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case WinRT.Message.WM_WINDOWPOSCHANGING:Di2015NewLine            WinRT.WINDOWPOS windowPosition = (WinRT.WINDOWPOS)Marshal.PtrToStructure(lParam, typeof(WinRT.WINDOWPOS));Di2015NewLine            Window handledWindow = (Window)HwndSource.FromHwnd(hwnd).RootVisual;Di2015NewLine            if(handledWindow == null)Di2015NewLine                return IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            bool hasChangedPosition = false;Di2015NewLine            if(this.IsMaximized == true && (this.Left != 0 || this.Top != 0)) {Di2015NewLine                windowPosition.x = windowPosition.y = 0;Di2015NewLine                windowPosition.cx = (int)SystemParameters.WorkArea.Width;Di2015NewLine                windowPosition.cy = (int)SystemParameters.WorkArea.Height;Di2015NewLine                hasChangedPosition = true;Di2015NewLine                this.UpdateChrome();Di2015NewLine                this.UpdateGlowWindow();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine true;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine    // END UNMANAGED WIN32Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14795752Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ZipArchiveExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void ExtractToDirectory(this ZipArchive archive, string destinationDirectoryName, bool overwrite)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!overwrite)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            archive.ExtractToDirectory(destinationDirectoryName);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (ZipArchiveEntry file in archive.Entries)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string completeFileName = Path.Combine(destinationDirectoryName, file.FullName);Di2015NewLine            if (file.Name == "")Di2015NewLine            {// Assuming Empty for DirectoryDi2015NewLine                Directory.CreateDirectory(Path.GetDirectoryName(completeFileName));Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            file.ExtractToFile(completeFileName, true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLine    // You can call the method from your own code, that way you can call native Di2015NewLine    // methods, in this case, install a font into windows.Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("gdi32.dll", EntryPoint = "AddFontResourceW", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    public static extern int AddFontResource([In][MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPWStr)]Di2015NewLine                                     string lpFileName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This is a unit test sample, which just executes the native method and showsDi2015NewLine    // you how to handle the result and get a potential error.Di2015NewLine    [Test]Di2015NewLine    public void InstallFont()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Try install the font.Di2015NewLine        var result = AddFontResource(@"C:\\MY_FONT_LOCATION\\MY_NEW_FONT.TTF");Di2015NewLine        var error = Marshal.GetLastWin32Error();Di2015NewLine        if (error != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(new Win32Exception(error).Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14797475Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ZeroMqSubscriberDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly ZmqContext _zmqContext;Di2015NewLine    private readonly ZmqSocket _zmqSocket;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Thread _workerThread;Di2015NewLine    private readonly ManualResetEvent _stopEvent = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine    private readonly object _locker = new object();Di2015NewLine    private readonly Queue<string> _queue = new Queue<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ZeroMqSubscriber(string endPoint)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _zmqContext = ZmqContext.Create();Di2015NewLine        _zmqSocket = _zmqContext.CreateSocket(SocketType.SUB);Di2015NewLine        _zmqSocket.Connect(endPoint);Di2015NewLine        _zmqSocket.SubscribeAll();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _workerThread = new Thread(ReceiveData);Di2015NewLine        _workerThread.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string[] GetMessages()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_locker)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var messages = _queue.ToArray();Di2015NewLine            _queue.Clear();Di2015NewLine            return messages;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Stop()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _stopEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine        _workerThread.Join();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ReceiveData()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         tryDi2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine             while (!_stopEvent.WaitOne(0))Di2015NewLine             {Di2015NewLine                 var message = _zmqSocket.Receive(Encoding.UTF8, Di2015NewLine                               new TimeSpan(0, 0, 0, 1));Di2015NewLine                 if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(message))Di2015NewLine                     continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                 lock (_locker)Di2015NewLine                     _queue.Enqueue(message);Di2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         finallyDi2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine             _zmqSocket.Dispose();Di2015NewLine             _zmqContext.Dispose();Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14802956Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring inputFilename = System.Diagnostics.Process.GetCurrentProcess().MainModule.FileName;Di2015NewLinestring outputFilename = inputFilename + ".secret";Di2015NewLinestring magic = "magic".ToUpper();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebyte[] data = File.ReadAllBytes(inputFilename);Di2015NewLinebyte[] magicData = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(magic);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int idx = magicData.Length - 1; idx < data.Length; idx++) {Di2015NewLine    bool found = true;Di2015NewLine    for (int magicIdx = 0; magicIdx < magicData.Length; magicIdx++) {Di2015NewLine        if (data[idx - magicData.Length + 1 + magicIdx] != magicData[magicIdx]) {Di2015NewLine            found = false;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (found) {Di2015NewLine        using (FileStream output = new FileStream(outputFilename, FileMode.Create)) {Di2015NewLine            output.Write(data, idx + 1, data.Length - idx - 1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14802956Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring inputFilename = System.Diagnostics.Process.GetCurrentProcess().MainModule.FileName;Di2015NewLinestring outputFilename = inputFilename + ".secret";Di2015NewLinestring marker = "magic".ToUpper();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebyte[] data = File.ReadAllBytes(inputFilename);Di2015NewLinebyte[] markerData = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(marker);Di2015NewLineint markerLength = markerData.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineconst int blockSize = 512; //important!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing(FileStream input = File.OpenRead(inputFilename)) {Di2015NewLine    long lastPosition = 0;Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[blockSize];Di2015NewLine    while (input.Read(buffer, 0, blockSize) >= markerLength) {Di2015NewLine        bool found = true;Di2015NewLine        for (int idx = 0; idx < markerLength; idx++) {Di2015NewLine            if (buffer[idx] != markerData[idx]) {Di2015NewLine                found = false;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (found) {Di2015NewLine            input.Position = lastPosition + markerLength;Di2015NewLine            using (FileStream output = File.OpenWrite(outputFilename)) {Di2015NewLine                input.CopyTo(output);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        lastPosition = input.Position;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14813041Di2015UniqueSeparator public double[] MultiplyNTimesNextCell(double number1, double number2, double timesToMultiply)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine       // result[0] is the value returned on the first cellDi2015NewLine       // result[1] is the value returned on the next cellDi2015NewLine       double[] result = new double[] {0, number1};Di2015NewLine       for (double i = 0; i < timesToMultiply; i++)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine            // hardcoded to result[1] where to return the resultDi2015NewLine            result[1] = result[1] * number2;Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14817256Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate DataTable Transpose(DataTable dt)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DataTable dtNew = new DataTable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //adding columns    Di2015NewLine    for(int i=0; i<=dt.Rows.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       dtNew.Columns.Add(i.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Changing Column Captions: Di2015NewLine    dtNew.Columns[0].ColumnName = " ";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     for(int i=0; i<dt.Rows.Count; i++) Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine      //For dateTime columns use like belowDi2015NewLine       dtNew.Columns[i+1].ColumnName = Convert.ToDateTime(dt.Rows[i].ItemArray[0].ToString()).ToString("MM/dd/yyyy");Di2015NewLine      //Else just assign the ItermArry[0] to the columnName proopertyDi2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Adding Row DataDi2015NewLine    for(int k=1; k<dt.Columns.Count; k++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataRow r = dtNew.NewRow();Di2015NewLine        r[0] = dt.Columns[k].ToString(); Di2015NewLine        for(int j=1; j<=dt.Rows.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine        r[j] = dt.Rows[j-1][k];  Di2015NewLine        dtNew.Rows.Add(r);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine return dtNew;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14823809Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class AscendingMinimaDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private struct MinimaValueDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int RemoveIndex { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public double Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static double[] GetMin(this double[] input, int window)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var queue = new Deque<MinimaValue>();Di2015NewLine        var result = new double[input.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < input.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var val = input[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Note: in Nito.Deque, queue[0] is the frontDi2015NewLine            while (queue.Count > 0 && i >= queue[0].RemoveIndex)Di2015NewLine                queue.RemoveFromFront();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (queue.Count > 0 && queue[queue.Count - 1].Value >= val)Di2015NewLine                queue.RemoveFromBack();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            queue.AddToBack(new MinimaValue{RemoveIndex = i + window, Value = val });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            result[i] = queue[0].Value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

java.net.Socket;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class JavaSocket {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine OutputStream os = socket.getOutputStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // ReceivingDi2015NewLine        byte[] lenBytes = new byte[4];Di2015NewLine        is.read(lenBytes, 0, 4);Di2015NewLine        int len = (((lenBytes[3] & 0xff) << 24) | ((lenBytes[2] & 0xff) << 16) |Di2015NewLine                  ((lenBytes[1] & 0xff) << 8) | (lenBytes[0] & 0xff));Di2015NewLine        byte[] receivedBytes = new byte[len];Di2015NewLine        is.read(receivedBytes, 0, len);Di2015NewLine        String received = new String(receivedBytes, 0, len);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.out.println("Server received: " + received);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // SendingDi2015NewLine        String toSend = "Echo: " + received;Di2015NewLine        byte[] toSendBytes = toSend.getBytes();Di2015NewLine        int toSendLen = toSendBytes.length;Di2015NewLine        byte[] toSendLenBytes = new byte[4];Di2015NewLine        toSendLenBytes[0] = (byte)(toSendLen & 0xff);Di2015NewLine        toSendLenBytes[1] = (byte)((toSendLen >> 8) & 0xff);Di2015NewLine        toSendLenBytes[2] = (byte)((toSendLen >> 16) & 0xff);Di2015NewLine        toSendLenBytes[3] = (byte)((toSendLen >> 24) & 0xff);Di2015NewLine        os.write(toSendLenBytes);Di2015NewLine        os.write(toSendBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        socket.close();Di2015NewLine        serverSocket.close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14825061Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net.Sockets;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace CSharpSocketDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class MainClassDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static void Main (string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string toSend = "Hello!";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            IPEndPoint serverAddress = new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Parse("192.168.0.6"), 4343);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Socket clientSocket = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork, SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.Tcp);Di2015NewLine            clientSocket.Connect(serverAddress);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // SendingDi2015NewLine            int toSendLen = System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetByteCount(toSend);Di2015NewLine            byte[] toSendBytes = System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(toSend);Di2015NewLine            byte[] toSendLenBytes = System.BitConverter.GetBytes(toSendLen);Di2015NewLine            clientSocket.Send(toSendLenBytes);Di2015NewLine            clientSocket.Send(toSendBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // ReceivingDi2015NewLine            byte[] rcvLenBytes = new byte[4];Di2015NewLine            clientSocket.Receive(rcvLenBytes);Di2015NewLine            int rcvLen = System.BitConverter.ToInt32(rcvLenBytes, 0);Di2015NewLine            byte[] rcvBytes = new byte[rcvLen];Di2015NewLine            clientSocket.Receive(rcvBytes);Di2015NewLine            String rcv = System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetString(rcvBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Client received: " + rcv);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            clientSocket.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14826974Di2015UniqueSeparatordynamic
14826977Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int i = 1;Di2015NewLine    int? iNullable = 1;Di2015NewLine    object o = 1;Di2015NewLine    int j = 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ParameterExpression pe1 = Expression.Parameter(typeof(int));Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression pe2 = Expression.Parameter(typeof(int));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //explicitly creating expression by calling Expression.Method works fineDi2015NewLine    Expression call = Expression.Equal(pe1, pe2);Di2015NewLine    var f = Expression.Lambda<Func<int, int, bool>>(call, pe1, pe2).Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(f(i, i));Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(f((int)iNullable, i));Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(f(i, (int)o));Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(f(i, j));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //I want to use a dynamic Expression method instead of Expression.EqualDi2015NewLine    //so that it could be substituted with Expression.GreaterThan etc.Di2015NewLine    List<String> expressionMethod = new List<string>(){"Equal", "GreaterThan"};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (String s in expressionMethod) DynamicExpression(s, j, i); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  static void DynamicExpression(String methodName, int n1, int n2)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression pe1 = Expression.Parameter(typeof(int));Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression pe2 = Expression.Parameter(typeof(int));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //get the methodDi2015NewLine    MethodInfo method = typeof(Expression)Di2015NewLine        .GetMethod(methodName,Di2015NewLine         new[] { typeof(Expression), typeof(Expression) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //InvokeDi2015NewLine    Expression dynamicExp = (Expression)method.Invoke(null, new object[] { pe1, pe2 });Di2015NewLine    var f = Expression.Lambda<Func<int, int, bool>>(dynamicExp, pe1, pe2).Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Result for " Di2015NewLine         + n1.ToString() + " " Di2015NewLine         + methodName + " " + n2.ToString() + ": " + f(n1, n2));Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14828598Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var processes = GetProcesses();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // enumerate the processesDi2015NewLine        foreach (Tuple<int,string> mediaFile in processes.Distinct())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var process = Process.GetProcesses().Where(i => i.Id == mediaFile.Item1).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{0} ({1}) uses {2}", process.ProcessName, process.Id, mediaFile.Item2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static List<Tuple<int,string>> GetProcesses()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string line = "";Di2015NewLine        int counter = 0;Di2015NewLine        string currentProcess = "";Di2015NewLine        List<Tuple<int, string>> mediaFiles = new List<Tuple<int, string>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Process compiler = new Process();Di2015NewLine        compiler.StartInfo.FileName = @"c:\\YourPath\\Handle.exe";Di2015NewLine        compiler.StartInfo.CreateNoWindow = true;Di2015NewLine        compiler.StartInfo.UseShellExecute = false;Di2015NewLine        compiler.StartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput = true;Di2015NewLine        compiler.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while ((line = compiler.StandardOutput.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // skipping applicaion infoDi2015NewLine            if (++counter > 6)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!" -".Contains(char.Parse(line.Substring(0, 1))))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    currentProcess = line;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if ((new[] { ".avi", ".mkv", ".mpg", ".mp4", ".wmv" })Di2015NewLine                    .Contains(line.ToLower().Substring(line.Length - 4)))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int pos = currentProcess.IndexOf("pid:") + 5;Di2015NewLine                    string pid = currentProcess.Substring(pos, currentProcess.IndexOf(" ", pos) - pos);Di2015NewLine                    mediaFiles.Add(new Tuple<int, string>(Int32.Parse(pid),line.Substring(21)));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        compiler.WaitForExit();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return mediaFiles;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14832517Di2015UniqueSeparatorDictionary<string, List<string>> dict = new Dictionary<string,List<string>>();Di2015NewLinewhile (dbReader.Read())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string code = (string)dbReader["CODE"];Di2015NewLine    string subject = (string)dbReader["SUBJECT"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<string> codes;Di2015NewLine    if (dict.TryGetValue(subject, out codes))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        codes.Add(code);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        codes = new List<string>() { code };Di2015NewLine        dict.Add(subject, codes);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14832623Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static readonly PropertyDefinitionBase AppointementIdPropertyDefinition = new ExtendedPropertyDefinition(DefaultExtendedPropertySet.PublicStrings, "AppointmentID", MapiPropertyType.String);Di2015NewLinepublic static PropertySet PropertySet = new PropertySet(BasePropertySet.FirstClassProperties, AppointementIdPropertyDefinition);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Setting the property for the appointment Di2015NewLine public static void SetGuidForAppointement(Appointment appointment)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        appointment.SetExtendedProperty((ExtendedPropertyDefinition)AppointementIdPropertyDefinition, Guid.NewGuid().ToString());Di2015NewLine        appointment.Update(ConflictResolutionMode.AlwaysOverwrite, SendInvitationsOrCancellationsMode.SendToNone);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // logging the exceptionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Getting the property for the appointmentDi2015NewLine public static string GetGuidForAppointement(Appointment appointment)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = "";Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        appointment.Load(PropertySet);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var extendedProperty in appointment.ExtendedProperties)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (extendedProperty.PropertyDefinition.Name == "AppointmentID")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result = extendedProperty.Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine     // logging the exceptionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine
14832623Di2015UniqueSeparator private static void SetGuidForMeetingAppiontment(Appointment appointment)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var log = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!appointment.IsMeeting) return;Di2015NewLine                if (appointment.Service.ImpersonatedUserId == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                /*Di2015NewLine                 * The only tricky case is that if the appointment is created at the attendee with no Guid.Di2015NewLine                 * In this case the application should look for the original appointment from the organizer's side, and get its guid, to paste it in the new booking Di2015NewLine                 * from the attendee side, and add the attendee emailAddress. Di2015NewLine                 */Di2015NewLine                if (GetGuidForMeetingAppointement(appointment).Length <= 36)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // If it was an attendee, then look for the original appointment from the organizer's serviceDi2015NewLine                    if (appointment.Service.ImpersonatedUserId.Id != appointment.Organizer.Address)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        log += "1/5 Getting the original event of the meeting\\n";Di2015NewLine                        if (ExchangeLiteService.Services.ContainsKey(appointment.Organizer.Address))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            //  FindItemsResults<Appointment> originalAppointments;Di2015NewLine                            var originalAppointments = ExchangeLiteService.Services[appointment.Organizer.Address].FindAppointments(WellKnownFolderName.Calendar, new CalendarView(appointment.Start, appointment.End, 1));Di2015NewLine                            if (originalAppointments == null) return; //there must be an original appointment. Di2015NewLine                            if (!originalAppointments.Any()) return; //there must be an original appointment. Di2015NewLine                            var originalAppointment = originalAppointments.First(); // there should be only one appointment at a specifict time and date. Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            log += "2/5 Getting the Guid for the original event of the meeting\\n";Di2015NewLine                            var originalAppointmentID = GetGuidForMeetingAppointement(originalAppointment);Di2015NewLine                            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(originalAppointmentID)) return; // the original appointment must have a guid already.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            var orignalAppointmentIDGuid = originalAppointmentID.Substring(0, 36);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            log += "3/5 Attaching the email address to the guid extracted\\n";Di2015NewLine                            var newAppointmentID = orignalAppointmentIDGuid + "_" + appointment.Service.ImpersonatedUserId.Id;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            log += "4/5 Setting the new Guid to the meeting appointment\\n";Di2015NewLine                            appointment.SetExtendedProperty((ExtendedPropertyDefinition)AppointementIdPropertyDefinition, newAppointmentID);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            log += "5/5 Updateing the meeting appointment\\n";Di2015NewLine                            appointment.Update(ConflictResolutionMode.AlwaysOverwrite, SendInvitationsOrCancellationsMode.SendToNone);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        else //Then the user is invited from an organizer outside the system.Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            // Delete if there are anything similar Di2015NewLine                            ExchangeLiteService.OnCallDeleteBookingFromInternal(appointment.Service.ImpersonatedUserId.Id, appointment.Start, appointment.End);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            //Assign a new Di2015NewLine                            var appointmentIDGuid = Guid.NewGuid().ToString();Di2015NewLine                            var newAppointmentID = appointmentIDGuid + "_" + appointment.Service.ImpersonatedUserId.Id;Di2015NewLine                            appointment.SetExtendedProperty((ExtendedPropertyDefinition)AppointementIdPropertyDefinition, newAppointmentID);Di2015NewLine                            appointment.Update(ConflictResolutionMode.AlwaysOverwrite, SendInvitationsOrCancellationsMode.SendToNone);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        //Get only the guid part of it (without the address of the organizer) Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else // if he was the organizer Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        log += "If it was new meeting appointment and the notification from the organizer\\n";Di2015NewLine                        var appointmentIDGuid = Guid.NewGuid().ToString();Di2015NewLine                        var newAppointmentID = appointmentIDGuid + "_" + appointment.Service.ImpersonatedUserId.Id;Di2015NewLine                        appointment.SetExtendedProperty((ExtendedPropertyDefinition)AppointementIdPropertyDefinition, newAppointmentID);Di2015NewLine                        appointment.Update(ConflictResolutionMode.AlwaysOverwrite, SendInvitationsOrCancellationsMode.SendToNone);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    log += "If it was an updated meeting appointment and has Guid already\\n";Di2015NewLine                    var appointmentID = GetGuidForMeetingAppointement(appointment);Di2015NewLine                    var appointmentIDGuid = appointmentID.Substring(0, 36);Di2015NewLine                    var newAppointmentID = appointmentIDGuid + "_" + appointment.Service.ImpersonatedUserId.Id;Di2015NewLine                    appointment.SetExtendedProperty((ExtendedPropertyDefinition)AppointementIdPropertyDefinition, newAppointmentID);Di2015NewLine                    appointment.Update(ConflictResolutionMode.AlwaysOverwrite, SendInvitationsOrCancellationsMode.SendToNone);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Logging the exceptionDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

14841067Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static IDictionary<string, FileSystemWatcher> _openWatchersDi2015NewLine    = new Dictionary<string, FileSystemWatcher>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void Watch(string watch_folder)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!bCreateWatcher)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_openWatchers.ContainsKey(watch_folder))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _openWatchers[watch_folder].Dispose();Di2015NewLine            _openWatchers.Remove(watch_folder);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    FileSystemWatcher watcher = new FileSystemWatcher();Di2015NewLine    watcher.InternalBufferSize = 8192; //defaults to 4KB, need 8KB bufferDi2015NewLine    watcher.Path = watch_folder;Di2015NewLine    watcher.NotifyFilter = NotifyFilters.LastAccess | NotifyFilters.LastWriteDi2015NewLine   | NotifyFilters.FileName | NotifyFilters.DirectoryName;Di2015NewLine    watcher.Filter = "*.*"; Di2015NewLine    watcher.Created += new FileSystemEventHandler(OnCreated);Di2015NewLine    // Begin watching.Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         watcher.EnableRaisingEvents = true;Di2015NewLine         _openWatchers[watch_folder] = watcher;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch(Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show(ForegroundWindow.Instance, "FSW not set correctly" + ex, "FSW Error");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine
14841067Di2015UniqueSeparatorDispose()
14841067Di2015UniqueSeparator public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine     foreach (FileSystemWatcher fsw in _openWatchers.Values)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine          fsw.Dispose();Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

14844052Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static readonly Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLineprivate static readonly object randLock = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic virtual string GenerateNonce()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    lock (randLock)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Just a simple implementation of a random number between 123400 and 9999999Di2015NewLine        return random.Next(123400, 9999999).ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// since you had protected access on random, I'm assuming sub classes want to use itDi2015NewLine// so you'll need to provide them with access to itDi2015NewLineprotected int NextRandom(...)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    lock (randLock)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         random.Next(...);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14844052Di2015UniqueSeparator// RNGCryptoServiceProvider is thread safe in .NET 3.5 and aboveDi2015NewLine// .NET 3.0 and below will need locking to protect accessDi2015NewLineprivate static readonly RNGCryptoServiceProvider random =Di2015NewLine    new RNGCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic /*virtual*/ byte[] GenerateNonce(int length)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // a default length could be specified instead of being parameterizedDi2015NewLine    var data = new byte[length];Di2015NewLine    random.GetNonZeroBytes(data);Di2015NewLine    return data;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// orDi2015NewLinepublic /*virtual*/ string GenerateNonce(int length)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var data = new byte[length];Di2015NewLine    random.GetNonZeroBytes(data);        Di2015NewLine    return Convert.ToBase64String(data);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14845448Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Reflection.Assembly assembly = System.Reflection.Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly();Di2015NewLineVersion version = assembly.GetName().Version;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (version.ToString() != Properties.Settings.Default.ApplicationVersion)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    copyLastUserConfig(version);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14845448Di2015UniqueSeparator    // Expected location of the current user configDi2015NewLine    DirectoryInfo currentVersionConfigFileDir = new FileInfo(ConfigurationManager.OpenExeConfiguration(ConfigurationUserLevel.PerUserRoamingAndLocal).FilePath).Directory;Di2015NewLine    if (currentVersionConfigFileDir == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Location of the previous user configDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // grab the most recent folder from the list of user's settings folders, prior to the current versionDi2015NewLine    var previousSettingsDir = (from dir in currentVersionConfigFileDir.Parent.GetDirectories()Di2015NewLine                               let dirVer = new { Dir = dir, Ver = new Version(dir.Name) }Di2015NewLine                               where dirVer.Ver < currentVersionDi2015NewLine                               orderby dirVer.Ver descendingDi2015NewLine                               select dir).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (previousSettingsDir == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // none found, nothing to do - first time app has run, let it build a new oneDi2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string previousVersionConfigFile = string.Concat(previousSettingsDir.FullName, @"\\", userConfigFileName);Di2015NewLine    string currentVersionConfigFile = string.Concat(currentVersionConfigFileDir.FullName, @"\\", userConfigFileName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!currentVersionConfigFileDir.Exists)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Directory.CreateDirectory(currentVersionConfigFileDir.FullName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    File.Copy(previousVersionConfigFile, currentVersionConfigFile, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinecatch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    HandleError("An error occurred while trying to upgrade your user specific settings for the new version. The program will continue to run, however user preferences such as screen sizes, locations etc will need to be reset.", ex);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14848078Di2015UniqueSeparatorinterface IDependOn<T> { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Oil { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Seat { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Wheel : IDependOn<Oil> { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Car : IDependOn<Wheel>, IDependOn<Oil> { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class TypeExtensions {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<Type> OrderByDependencies(this IEnumerable<Type> types) {Di2015NewLine  if (types == null)Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentNullException("types");Di2015NewLine  var dictionary = types.ToDictionary(t => t, t => GetDependOnTypes(t));Di2015NewLine  var list = dictionaryDi2015NewLine    .Where(kvp => !kvp.Value.Any())Di2015NewLine    .Select(kvp => kvp.Key)Di2015NewLine    .ToList();Di2015NewLine  foreach (var type in list)Di2015NewLine    dictionary.Remove(type);Di2015NewLine  foreach (var keyValuePair in dictionary.Where(kvp => !kvp.Value.Any())) {Di2015NewLine    list.Add(keyValuePair.Key);Di2015NewLine    dictionary.Remove(keyValuePair.Key);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  while (dictionary.Count > 0) {Di2015NewLine    var type = dictionary.Keys.First();Di2015NewLine    Recurse(type, dictionary, list);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return list;Di2015NewLine}    Di2015NewLine  static void Recurse(Type type, Dictionary<Type, IEnumerable<Type>> dictionary, List<Type> list) {Di2015NewLine    if (!dictionary.ContainsKey(type))Di2015NewLine      return;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var dependOnType in dictionary[type])Di2015NewLine      Recurse(dependOnType, dictionary, list);Di2015NewLine    list.Add(type);Di2015NewLine    dictionary.Remove(type);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  static IEnumerable<Type> GetDependOnTypes(Type type) {Di2015NewLine    return typeDi2015NewLine      .GetInterfaces()Di2015NewLine      .Where(i => i.IsGenericType && i.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(IDependOn<>))Di2015NewLine      .Select(i => i.GetGenericArguments().First());Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14849769Di2015UniqueSeparator[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple = true, Inherited = true)]Di2015NewLinepublic class OptionalTheoryAttribute : TheoryAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override IEnumerable<ITestCommand> EnumerateTestCommands(IMethodInfo method)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = (List<ITestCommand>)base.EnumerateTestCommands(method);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return TransferToSupportOptional(result, method);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Clear();Di2015NewLine            result.Add(new LambdaTestCommand(method, () =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new InvalidOperationException(Di2015NewLine                        String.Format("An exception was thrown while getting data for theory {0}.{1}:\\r\\n{2}",Di2015NewLine                            method.TypeName, method.Name, ex)Di2015NewLine                        );Di2015NewLine                }));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<ITestCommand> TransferToSupportOptional(Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<ITestCommand> testCommands, IMethodInfo method)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var parameterInfos = method.MethodInfo.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine        testCommands.OfType<TheoryCommand>().ToList().ForEach(Di2015NewLine            testCommand => typeof(TheoryCommand)Di2015NewLine                               .GetProperty("Parameters")Di2015NewLine                               .SetValue(testCommand, GetParameterValues(testCommand, parameterInfos)));Di2015NewLine        return testCommands;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static object[] GetParameterValues(TheoryCommand testCommand, ParameterInfo[] parameterInfos)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var specifiedValues = testCommand.Parameters;Di2015NewLine        var optionalValues = GetOptionalValues(testCommand, parameterInfos);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return specifiedValues.Concat(optionalValues).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<object> GetOptionalValues(TheoryCommand command, ParameterInfo[] parameterInfos)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Enumerable.Range(command.Parameters.Length, parameterInfos.Length - command.Parameters.Length)Di2015NewLine                         .ToList().Select(i =>Di2015NewLine                             {Di2015NewLine                                 EnsureIsOptional(parameterInfos[i]);Di2015NewLine                                 return Type.Missing;Di2015NewLine                             });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void EnsureIsOptional(ParameterInfo parameterInfo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!parameterInfo.IsOptional)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException(string.Format(Di2015NewLine                "The parameter '{0}' should be optional or specified from data attribute.",Di2015NewLine                parameterInfo));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinternal class LambdaTestCommand : TestCommandDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Assert.ThrowsDelegate lambda;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public LambdaTestCommand(IMethodInfo method, Assert.ThrowsDelegate lambda)Di2015NewLine        : base(method, null, 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.lambda = lambda;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool ShouldCreateInstanceDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override MethodResult Execute(object testClass)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lambda();Di2015NewLine            return new PassedResult(testMethod, DisplayName);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new FailedResult(testMethod, ex, DisplayName);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class OptionalTheoryTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [OptionalTheory]Di2015NewLine    [InlineData(1)]Di2015NewLine    [InlineData(1, true)]Di2015NewLine    public void TestMethod(int num, bool fast = true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // ArrangeDi2015NewLine        // ActDi2015NewLine        // AssertDi2015NewLine        Assert.Equal(1, num);Di2015NewLine        Assert.True(fast);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14853950Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public enum OperatorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        And,Di2015NewLine        OrDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class ConditionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Operator Operator { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string FieldName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public object Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class DatabaseRowDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int A { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string B { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var conditions = new List<Condition>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new Condition { Operator = Operator.And, FieldName = "A", Value = 1 },Di2015NewLine            new Condition { Operator = Operator.And, FieldName = "B", Value = "Asger" },Di2015NewLine            new Condition { Operator = Operator.Or, FieldName = "A", Value = 2 },Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof (DatabaseRow), "x");Di2015NewLine        var currentExpr = MakeExpression(conditions.First(), parameter);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var condition in conditions.Skip(1))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var nextExpr = MakeExpression(condition, parameter);Di2015NewLine            switch (condition.Operator)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case Operator.And:Di2015NewLine                    currentExpr = Expression.And(currentExpr, nextExpr);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case Operator.Or:Di2015NewLine                    currentExpr = Expression.Or(currentExpr, nextExpr);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var predicate = Expression.Lambda<Func<DatabaseRow, bool>>(currentExpr, parameter).Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var input = new[]Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new DatabaseRow {A = 1, B = "Asger"},Di2015NewLine            new DatabaseRow {A = 2, B = "Hans"},Di2015NewLine            new DatabaseRow {A = 3, B = "Grethe"}Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var results = input.Where(predicate).ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static BinaryExpression MakeExpression(Condition condition, ParameterExpression parameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Equal(Di2015NewLine            Expression.MakeMemberAccess(parameter, typeof (DatabaseRow).GetMember(condition.FieldName)[0]),Di2015NewLine            Expression.Constant(condition.Value));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14855414Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static XmlDocument PostXMLTransaction(string URL, XmlDocument XMLDoc)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Declare XMLResponse documentDi2015NewLine        XmlDocument XMLResponse = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Declare an HTTP-specific implementation of the WebRequest class.Di2015NewLine        HttpWebRequest objHttpWebRequest;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Declare an HTTP-specific implementation of the WebResponse classDi2015NewLine        HttpWebResponse objHttpWebResponse = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Declare a generic view of a sequence of bytesDi2015NewLine        Stream objRequestStream = null;Di2015NewLine        Stream objResponseStream = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Declare XMLReaderDi2015NewLine        XmlTextReader objXMLReader;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Creates an HttpWebRequest for the specified URL.Di2015NewLine        objHttpWebRequest = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(URL);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //---------- Start HttpRequestDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Set HttpWebRequest propertiesDi2015NewLine            byte[] bytes;Di2015NewLine            bytes = System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(XMLDoc.InnerXml);Di2015NewLine            objHttpWebRequest.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine            objHttpWebRequest.ContentLength = bytes.Length;Di2015NewLine            objHttpWebRequest.ContentType = "text/xml; encoding='utf-8'";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Get Stream objectDi2015NewLine            objRequestStream = objHttpWebRequest.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Writes a sequence of bytes to the current streamDi2015NewLine            objRequestStream.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Close streamDi2015NewLine            objRequestStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //---------- End HttpRequestDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Sends the HttpWebRequest, and waits for a response.Di2015NewLine            objHttpWebResponse = (HttpWebResponse)objHttpWebRequest.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //---------- Start HttpResponseDi2015NewLine            if (objHttpWebResponse.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.OK)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Get response streamDi2015NewLine                objResponseStream = objHttpWebResponse.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Load response stream into XMLReaderDi2015NewLine                objXMLReader = new XmlTextReader(objResponseStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Declare XMLDocumentDi2015NewLine                XmlDocument xmldoc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine                xmldoc.Load(objXMLReader);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Set XMLResponse object returned from XMLReaderDi2015NewLine                XMLResponse = xmldoc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Close XMLReaderDi2015NewLine                objXMLReader.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Close HttpWebResponseDi2015NewLine            objHttpWebResponse.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (WebException we)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //TODO: Add custom exception handlingDi2015NewLine            throw new Exception(we.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Close connectionsDi2015NewLine            objRequestStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            objResponseStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            objHttpWebResponse.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Release objectsDi2015NewLine            objXMLReader = null;Di2015NewLine            objRequestStream = null;Di2015NewLine            objResponseStream = null;Di2015NewLine            objHttpWebResponse = null;Di2015NewLine            objHttpWebRequest = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //ReturnDi2015NewLine        return XMLResponse;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14855924Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static bool CompareStrings(string str1, string str2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ar1 = Regex.Matches(str1, @"[\\d%]+").Cast<Match>().Select(m => m.Value).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        var ar2 = Regex.Matches(str2, @"[\\d%]+").Cast<Match>().Select(m => m.Value).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (ar1.Length != ar2.Length)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check wildcards and numbersDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < ar1.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            if (ar1[i] != ar2[i] && ar1[i] != "%" && ar2[i] != "%")Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Remove wildards and numbers to check the other charactersDi2015NewLine        if (Regex.Replace(str1, @"[\\d%]+", String.Empty) != Regex.Replace(str2, @"[\\d%]+", String.Empty))Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
14856195Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<string> list = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        List<int> positions = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine        bool checkNext = false;Di2015NewLine        int position = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DataTable dataTable = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine        dataTable.Columns.Add("to");Di2015NewLine        dataTable.Columns.Add("from");Di2015NewLine        dataTable.Columns.Add("heading");Di2015NewLine        dataTable.Columns.Add("body");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var rs = new XmlReaderSettings();Di2015NewLine        rs.IgnoreWhitespace = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var reader = XmlReader.Create(File.OpenRead("data.xml"), rs))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (reader.Name == "")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    list.Add(reader.Value);Di2015NewLine                    position++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (checkNext)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // TODO: apply your filterDi2015NewLine                    if (reader.Value.ToLower().StartsWith("j"))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        positions.Add(position);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (reader.Name == "from")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    checkNext = !checkNext;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (int match in positions)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dataTable.Rows.Add(Di2015NewLine                list[match -
